Technologies: X-UA-Compatible, jQuery, Apache, Twitter, Font Awesome, PWA, reCAPTCHA, PHP, Microsoft, Microsoft 365, IONOS, TYPO3, X-Content-Type-Options, Piwik PRO Core, RSS, Apache HTTP Server, Open Graph, Matomo, BRT, YouTube, HSTS, Magnific Popup
Company description: Ifeu - Institut Für Energie- Und Umweltforschung Heidelberg GGmbH is a prominent research institute dedicated to addressing critical energy and environmental challenges, with a strong emphasis on sustainable building practices and energy efficiency. The institute's mission is to facilitate the transition towards a decarbonized and energy-efficient built environment, aligning its efforts with European directives such as the Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (EPBD). Ifeu engages in collaborative partnerships with a diverse array of stakeholders, including national ministries, industry representatives, energy providers, and European institutions, to foster knowledge exchange and develop practical solutions for implementing energy efficiency standards and renovation strategies. Ifeu's target market encompasses governmental bodies, construction companies, environmental organizations, and residential consumers, all of whom benefit from the institute's expertise in energy performance, building renovation, and sustainable development practices. The institute is particularly focused on analyzing energy consumption patterns and developing strategies to reduce energy use, especially in residential settings. Through initiatives like the Concerted Action EPBD VI, Ifeu plays a vital role in shaping policies and practices aimed at reducing greenhouse gas emissions and enhancing the overall energy efficiency of buildings across Europe. In addition to its work in the building sector, Ifeu also explores innovative technologies and strategies for optimizing heating systems, utilizing smart technologies and data analysis to empower users and operators to manage energy consumption effectively. The institute's research initiatives span various sectors, including transportation and renewable energy, aiming to promote informed decision-making and foster sustainable practices. By bridging the gap between scientific research and practical application, Ifeu is committed to advancing energy efficiency and environmental sustainability, ultimately contributing to a more sustainable energy system for future generations.

Company description: EEW Energy from Waste GmbH is a leading European company specializing in the thermal recycling of waste and sewage sludge. With 17 facilities across Germany and neighboring countries, the company processes up to 5 million tons of waste annually, converting it into valuable energy in the form of process steam for industrial applications, district heating for residential areas, and environmentally friendly electricity. EEW's mission is to contribute to a sustainable circular economy by conserving natural resources, recovering valuable raw materials, and reducing carbon emissions. The company employs approximately 1,400 dedicated professionals and collaborates with various partners, including local governments and energy providers, to enhance waste management solutions and energy supply. EEW is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace, offering its employees opportunities for professional development and a supportive work environment.

Company description: LnettAS is a Norwegian company that operates within the energy sector, specifically focusing on providing a new government initiative called Norgespris. This program offers private customers a predictable electricity price of 50 øre/kWh, inclusive of VAT, for their homes and holiday properties, serving as an alternative to the existing electricity support scheme. LnettAS aims to enhance customer satisfaction by ensuring transparency and stability in electricity pricing, while also facilitating the billing process through partnerships with electricity suppliers. The target market includes private households and vacation homes, with a consumption cap of 5,000 kWh per month for residential customers and 1,000 kWh for holiday properties. By actively engaging customers to opt into the Norgespris program, LnettAS seeks to provide a reliable energy solution while maintaining compliance with regulatory standards set by the government.

Company description: Fjordkraft AS, a subsidiary of Elmera Group ASA, is a prominent electricity retailer based in Norway, specializing in providing innovative energy solutions to both residential and business customers. The company's mission is to create the most attractive electricity retail experience in the Nordics, with a vision to supply electricity services to 3 million people at home and work. Fjordkraft serves a diverse clientele, including energy-intensive industrial manufacturers, large corporations, and small local businesses, while also focusing on enhancing customer experience through digital solutions like their popular app.  Committed to sustainability and the green transition, Fjordkraft offers services that promote energy efficiency and renewable energy production, such as solar panel installations and electric vehicle charging solutions. The company collaborates with various partners, including Telia for mobile services and other electricity retailers, to expand its market presence and improve service offerings. Fjordkraft aims to empower consumers to make informed choices about their energy consumption while promoting a low-emission society. With a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction and compliance with evolving energy regulations, Fjordkraft leverages advanced technology and user-friendly platforms to optimize energy use and reduce costs. The company is dedicated to supporting the transition to renewable energy and has set ambitious goals, such as doubling the number of customers utilizing solar power annually. Fjordkraft's commitment to ethical governance and social responsibility is evident in its stringent supplier code of conduct and ongoing community engagement efforts. As a leading energy provider in the Nordic region, Fjordkraft continues to adapt to the evolving energy market, ensuring that it remains a trusted partner for its clients while contributing to a sustainable future.

Company description: Elmera Group ASA is a leading electricity retailer based in Bergen, Norway, specializing in the purchase, sale, and portfolio management of electrical power across the Nordic region, including Norway, Sweden, and Finland. The company is dedicated to providing a comprehensive range of sustainable energy solutions, including electricity supply, billing services, and innovative technology solutions tailored for both consumers and businesses. With a mission to create the most attractive electricity retailers in the Nordics, Elmera Group aims to serve approximately 3 million customers while promoting energy efficiency and sustainability. The company operates under several well-known brands, such as Fjordkraft, Gudbrandsdal Energi, and Nordic Green Energy, catering to a diverse clientele that includes individual consumers, small businesses, and large corporations. Elmera Group is committed to leveraging cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights to optimize energy consumption and enhance profitability for its customers. Its strategic focus includes revenue growth, cost efficiency, and the development of new business opportunities, all while adhering to ethical practices and sustainability. Elmera Group actively engages with suppliers to ensure compliance with climate-related requirements and fosters a culture of continuous improvement among its employees. The company collaborates with various stakeholders, including regulatory authorities and local energy providers, to advocate for fair competition and effective energy policies that benefit society and the environment. With a strong emphasis on corporate governance and social responsibility, Elmera Group is well-positioned to lead the transition towards a low-carbon economy, ensuring long-term value creation for its stakeholders while addressing the evolving needs of the energy market.

Company description: PGNiG Supply & Trading GmbH (PST) is the international trading, marketing and shipping arm of PGNiG S.A. - Poland’s largest gas supplier (listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange, 30.000 employees, +>30 subsidiaries). PST is dedicated to operate in natural gas and power trading on liquid Western-European wholesale markets and deliveries to industrial customers in Germany, the Netherlands, Austria, Czech Republic and Slovakia. In addition, PST is active in gas storage optimization and has become through its branch in London the Groups’ international LNG competence & trading center. PST Europe Sales www.pst-energie.de is the retail subsidiary of PST which supplies gas and power to end customers from household and industrial segment in Germany and Austria. XOOL is a brand for household gas customers.  Key strategic operations of PST include: -	Increasing security of gas supplies to Poland -	Marketing of gas produced by upstream companies -	Optimization of gas flows of PGNiG Group -	LNG trading and supply of LNG to Świnoujście Terminal -	Developing new markets for the PGNiG Group -	Offering market access and tailor made solutions for municipal utilities, resellers and industrial customers  -	Small-Scale LNG

The company is committed to promoting sustainable energy practices, offering 100% renewable energy options and innovative services such as energy consulting to help customers optimize their energy consumption. NorgesEnergi's mission focuses on facilitating the transition to a greener energy future while ensuring customer satisfaction through reliable and transparent services. Its target market includes environmentally conscious consumers and businesses looking for efficient energy solutions. Company description: EDP Group è una società energetica globale che opera lungo tutta la catena del valore dell'industria energetica, dalla generazione, alla distribuzione e fornitura di elettricità e gas, presente in 4 continenti e 20 paesi. EDP Energia Italia, società retail di EDP Group, è entrata nel mercato italiano dell'energia elettrica come fornitore di energia, preceduta dalla consolidata presenza di EDP Renewables dal 2010. EDP Energia Italia ha iniziato a fornire i primi clienti nell'aprile 2019 e sta ancora ampliando il proprio portafoglio B2B. Oltre alla fornitura di energia, EDP Energia Italia offre una serie di soluzioni innovative che consentono alle imprese di ottenere efficienza, ottimizzare i consumi e aumentare l'utilizzo di energie rinnovabili. Oltre a una forte attenzione alla promozione della generazione distribuita attraverso soluzioni solari fotovoltaiche, EDP fornisce altri servizi di efficienza energetica come l'ottimizzazione dei contratti o gli audit energetici. Nel 2021 EDP Group ha annunciato un investimento record nelle energie rinnovabili e avviato un programma di trasformazione per rafforzare EDP come organizzazione a prova di futuro e come azienda che eccelle nelle sue prestazioni ESG con un obiettivo chiaro: essere completamente verde entro il 2030. Vogliamo continuare a cambiare il domani, oggi. #EDPChangingTomorrowNow

Company description: Regionaal Energieloket is an organization dedicated to supporting municipalities in the Netherlands in their efforts to make residential and commercial properties more sustainable. With a mission to create "a sustainable home for everyone," the company focuses on providing fair and accessible information to facilitate the energy transition. By working closely with over 100 municipalities, Regionaal Energieloket offers a range of services, including advice on energy-saving measures, assistance with subsidy applications, and the facilitation of collective purchasing initiatives.  The organization serves a diverse clientele, which includes residents looking to enhance their sustainability efforts and municipal authorities seeking guidance in implementing sustainability policies. Regionaal Energieloket is committed to using public funds efficiently to maximize the number of residents it can assist. By bridging the gap between energy suppliers and municipalities, the company ensures that requests for proposals are aligned with practical needs and expectations.  Regionaal Energieloket emphasizes continuous improvement, learning from past experiences to refine its approach and deliver better outcomes for its clients. Through personalized consultations, the organization empowers residents and stakeholders in their energy transition journey, promoting sustainable energy practices across local communities. Collaborating with various partners, Regionaal Energieloket is dedicated to enhancing the quality of energy solutions and fostering a more sustainable future for all.

Wij geloven dat naast scherpe prijzen het verschil wordt gemaakt door een professionele en aanhoudend correcte manier van zakendoen. Wij bieden de klant producten op maat aan die zorgen voor een doordachte en correcte strategie rond energieaankopen in directe verbinding met de groothandelsmarkt(en), en met betrouwbare inschattingen rond het genomen risico. Dit resulteert in solide en langdurige besparingen.  Naast het leveren van energie informeren we u over marktopportuniteiten, bevorderen we uw energieonafhankelijkheid, maken we u wegwijs in alle aspecten die uw energiefactuur aangaan en bouwen we aan vertrouwen. Company description: As pioneers and experts, BET shapes the energy landscape of tomorrow.  As an independent and strong partner, we develop solutions for the successful positioning of our customers.  BET stands for diversity, passion and excellence.  BET is a leading energy and water management consultancy based in Aachen, with offices in Leipzig and Berlin and a subsidiary in Switzerland, BET Suisse AG. BET supports energy suppliers, public utilities and new market participants in all questions of the energy markets and provides highly qualified advice along the entire value chain. Our clients include municipal, regional and private energy suppliers as well as energy traders, power plant operators, industrial and commercial enterprises, municipalities and ministries, national and international supervisory authorities, scientific and research institutions as well as political decision-makers and financial investors.

Company description: Enmacc is a leading digital trading platform that specializes in automating and digitizing energy procurement processes for utilities and energy providers. The company's mission is to enhance market access and transparency in energy trading, enabling clients to manage their procurement activities efficiently and effectively. Enmacc serves a diverse clientele, including regional energy utilities like eregio, which relies on the platform for handling a significant portion of its forward contracts in natural gas and electricity. By integrating with post-trading solutions like Fidectus, Enmacc aims to streamline the entire deal lifecycle, from trading to invoicing, thereby supporting clients in their transition towards a more automated and future-ready operational framework. The platform is designed to facilitate high trading frequency, automation, and traceability, making it an indispensable tool for energy providers focused on structured procurement.

We help energy suppliers, traders, and large-scale consumers streamline complex processes with smart, scalable software—so everyone can participate in the energy value chain. Our data-driven platforms offer future proof energy products, automate processes, and strengthen customer relationships. Company description: Deftpower is a pioneering cleantech company founded by Jacob, Marc, and Remco, dedicated to transforming energy consumption through the integration of renewable sources like solar and wind into electric vehicle (EV) charging. Their mission is to accelerate the adoption of electric vehicles, thereby reducing reliance on fossil fuels and contributing to a cleaner, greener future. Deftpower's innovative software solutions optimize energy consumption, allowing EVs to act as power banks that store renewable energy, while also minimizing the carbon footprint associated with energy production. The company collaborates with industry leaders, government agencies, and communities to drive innovation in the clean tech sector, targeting a diverse clientele that includes EV drivers, fleet managers, and energy suppliers. By fostering partnerships and promoting sustainable practices, Deftpower aims to create a harmonious world that prioritizes environmental stewardship and economic success for all stakeholders.

Company description: Langmatz GmbH, founded in 1963 in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, has evolved from a craft business into a leading international industrial company specializing in technical system solutions for telecommunications, energy technology, and urban infrastructure. With a commitment to innovation and quality, Langmatz develops and markets advanced products that support the expansion of broadband networks, e-charging infrastructure, and smart city concepts. The company employs around 440 staff and generates an annual revenue of approximately 100 million euros, making it one of the largest industrial employers in the region. Langmatz prioritizes employee development and actively engages in training young professionals across various technical and commercial fields. Its clientele includes telecommunications companies, energy providers, municipal utilities, and local governments, reflecting its mission to provide reliable and future-oriented infrastructure solutions.

KG is a leading manufacturer specializing in electrical installation products, particularly known for their high-quality distribution boards and junction boxes. The company focuses on providing innovative solutions that ensure safety and efficiency in electrical installations, catering to a diverse range of applications in industrial, commercial, and residential sectors. With a commitment to quality and durability, their products are designed to withstand challenging environments, featuring robust materials and advanced protection ratings. Spelsberg serves a wide array of clients, including electrical contractors, energy suppliers, and architects, and collaborates with various partners to enhance their product offerings. The company's mission is to deliver reliable and user-friendly electrical solutions that meet the evolving needs of their customers while maintaining a strong emphasis on sustainability and safety.

Company description: First Climate is a leading provider of climate solutions that assists companies in achieving climate neutrality by addressing their greenhouse gas emissions. The company’s mission is to empower organizations to actively contribute to climate action through a structured approach that includes calculating carbon footprints, implementing energy efficiency measures, and supporting high-quality carbon reduction and removal projects worldwide. First Climate serves a diverse clientele, including public municipal utility companies and energy providers, helping them navigate the complexities of sustainability reporting and compliance with regulations such as the Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive (CSRD) and EU Taxonomy. By offering tailored services and expert guidance, First Climate aims to facilitate the transition to sustainable operations and foster a culture of environmental responsibility among businesses.

Company description: ENERGRID Ltd. a sole shareholder company, has been active in the sale of electricity since 2001 and in natural gas since 2008. Founded by Gavio Group, whose core business is the construction and management of infrastructure networks (highways, railways, airports), EnerGrid entered the market as an energy supplier following the liberalization of the electricity market launched by the European Community In 1996. In 2016, EneGrid has been acquired by the US HII Group (Holding for International Investments). EnerGrid is among the protagonists of the electricity market with consolidated turnover of 523 million euros, the company today is a company that supplies over 45,000 utilities nationwide, for a total of about 3 TWh sold in 2015 .

Company description: Gas- und Wärme-Institut Essen e.V. (GWI) is a prominent research and development organization focused on advancing the energy transition, particularly in the industrial sector. The institute's mission is to facilitate the decarbonization of process heat and promote sustainable energy solutions through innovative research, collaboration, and knowledge exchange. GWI serves a diverse clientele, including industrial companies, energy providers, and academic institutions, and collaborates with various partners such as NRW.Energy4Climate and the University of Duisburg-Essen. By hosting events and workshops, GWI fosters dialogue among stakeholders to explore practical approaches to achieving climate neutrality in industry. The institute is dedicated to developing comprehensive energy concepts that integrate renewable energy sources and enhance the efficiency of energy systems, ultimately contributing to a sustainable and economically viable energy future.

Company description: Fosfa currently operates production units in Germany, Czech Republic and Kazakhstan. The company creates revenues globally in over 80 countries with its commitment to service excellence as a pillar of its operations.  We live to give is what inspires and unites the people at Fosfa, together we embrace every opportunity to serve a purpose, share our knowledge and create new solutions. This is how Fosfa’s philosophy “we live to give” comes to life. The foundation of its business, established in 1884, is a portfolio of phosphate based products. Today, Fosfa is the largest processor of yellow phosphorus in Europe and is a global player in phosphoric acid, food and technical quality sodium, potassium and ammonium phosphates. Fosfa has also established its dominance as leader in private label markets in Central Eastern Europe for the detergent segment. Fosfa is the producer and marketer of an environmental friendly line of home care, personal care and energy provider under the FEEL ECO brand.   Innovation is our passion and nature is our inspiration. This is how phosphate, a basic element of nature that is essential for the development of life, inspires us to continuously develop new market segments and product applications. We are most proud of our recent product innovation – The Vertical Farm.  With purpose, people and products at the heart its strategy, Fosfa does not focus solely on one industry but on solutions for the future.  At Fosfa, everyone can make a difference. We value our people, respect each other, our differences and encourage contributions.

Company description: Družba Geoplin zagotavlja konkurenčno in zanesljivo dobavo zemeljskega plina z razpršenimi nabavnimi viri, transportnimi in skladiščnimi zmogljivostmi. Produkte in storitve prilagajamo individualnim zahtevam odjemalcev.  Družba Geoplin je bila ustanovljena leta 1975 in je najpomembnejši dobavitelj zemeljskega plina v Sloveniji ter pomemben strateški partner na področju energetike v sosednjih državah.  Dejavnosti družbe: -	dobava, trgovanja, zastopanje in posredovanje na trgu z zemeljskim plinom  -	energetske rešitve Družba posluje na slovenskem in tudi na tujih trgih (predvsem na Hrvaškem in v Avstriji). Družba Geoplin je stoodstotna lastnica družb, ki tvorijo skupino Geoplin: -	Geoplin društvo s ograničenom odgovornošću za trgovinu i opskrbu energentima (Zagreb, Hrvaška) -	Geoplin d. o. o. Beograd, Srbija -	Geocom d. o. o. - - - Geoplin ensures the competitive, reliable and flexible supply of natural gas to customers through diversified natural gas sources and by leasing of transmission and storage capacities. Geoplin was established in 1975. It is the leading natural gas supplier in Slovenia and a significant energy player in neighbouring countries. Geoplin is engaged in: -	supply, trade, representation and intermediation on the natural gas market -	energy management solutions Geoplin operates in Slovenia and abroad (mainly in Croatia and Austria). The Geoplin Group comprises the parent company Geoplin d.o.o. Our customers benefit from the stability and experience of Germany's leading electricity provider, as well as the innovation and dynamism of a successful growth company. What do we offer? As a full-service photovoltaics provider, we support you throughout Germany - from your first contact request to the commissioning of your system. We want to drive the energy transition forward, help you save money, and enable you to achieve maximum independence. How do we do that?  By providing great advice - as confirmed by our customers. In a survey conducted in October and November 2014, 100% of customers praised our professional, friendly and unobtrusive advice. See for yourself - free and with no strings attached. Einfach. Klar. Solar.

Founded in 2004 in Cork, Ireland, Nualight is a specialist European LED lighting company selling predominately refrigeration lighting into the world’s leading grocery retailers, refrigeration display case manufacturers, specialist refrigeration wholesalers and distributors.    With a heritage in award winning, market leading solutions and due to its progressive and nimble approach, Nualight is also privileged to serve select key accounts within industrial and infrastructure applications.   All Nualight solutions are engineered with a focus on high quality and performance. The comprehensive and versatile product portfolio promises to deliver real ROI, higher sales, lower energy bills and solutions that consistently go on creating unrivalled impactful and inspiring spaces that withstand the test of time.   More than a decade on, the entrepreneurial and collaborative culture that thrust the company to the forefront of the grocery retail category is still strong as is proven both by the successful long term partnerships with customers and with Nualight’s ability to attract some of the brightest, most dynamic individuals in the industry.   Nualight is funded by major resource efficiency and renewable energy investors: Adaxia Capital Partners and ESB Novusmodus managed by Greencoat Capital.  The company has a sales presence throughout Europe and Australia. For more information visit www.nualight.com

Name: EWR GmbH Remscheid
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Remscheid, 81-87 Neuenkamper Str., 42855
Technologies: Punycode, WordPress, Priority Hints, Mittwald, Yoast SEO, X-UA-Compatible, OneTrust, JetPack, Cloudflare Bot Management, WP Featherlight, Google Analytics, CloudFlare
Company description: Herzlich willkommen bei der EWR GmbH, wo Lebensqualität und Verbundenheit an erster Stelle stehen. Wir sind Mitglied eines regionalen Unternehmensverbundes, zu dem die Stadtwerke Remscheid GmbH (SR), die Park-Service Remscheid GmbH (PSR) und das H2O Sauna- und Badeparadies (H2O) gehören. Seit unserer Ausgründung im Jahr 2001 von der Stadtwerke Remscheid GmbH haben wir nicht nur für Energie und Wasser in Remscheid gesorgt, sondern sind auch stetig gewachsen und haben unsere Geschäfts- und Versorgungsfelder erweitert. Als lokaler Energieanbieter Nr. 1 stehen wir auch zum Zukunftsthema Elektromobilität bereit. Wir als Arbeitgeber: Als Arbeitgeber bieten wir Ihnen nicht nur einen Job, sondern einen sinnvollen Beitrag für die Menschen vor Ort. Egal, ob Sie als Sachbearbeiter*in, Ingenieur*in für Elektrotechnik oder IT-Spezialist*in einsteigen – bei uns erwartet Sie mehr als nur ein Job. Wir legen großen Wert auf Work-Life-Balance und ermöglichen Ihnen durch flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle sowie bewährte Dienstpläne und Schichteinteilungen, die optimale Abstimmung von Familienleben, Freizeit und Hobbys. Ihr Engagement wird bei uns nicht nur durch ein attraktives Gehalt, sondern auch durch alle Sozialleistungen und weitere Vorteile nach den Tarifverträgen honoriert. Zudem legen wir großen Wert auf Ihre Gesundheit und bieten hierfür eine Vielzahl von Benefits, die Ihr Wohlbefinden aktiv unterstützen, so steht Ihnen z. B. hausintern Physiotherapie zur Verfügung. Unsere interne Entwicklungsschmiede eröffnet Ihnen die Möglichkeit, kontinuierlich an Ihrer beruflichen Weiterentwicklung zu arbeiten. Bereichern Sie unseren Verbund und gestalten Sie mit uns die Zukunft – nicht nur für unser Unternehmen, sondern auch für die Region. Möchten auch Sie Ihre Spuren in Remscheid hinterlassen und die Auswirkungen Ihrer Arbeit täglich erleben?  Dann bewerben Sie sich bei uns über unsere Karriereseite: Stellenangebote – Stadtwerke Remscheid – Karriereportal (sr-karriere.de)

Company description: natGAS Aktiengesellschaft is an independent international energy provider in the fields of gas and power. As an independent service provider, natGAS is active on the national and international energy market and offers a wide range of services from the pure gas and power supply to customer-specific services and solutions to trading at various energy exchanges and marketplaces. Today, its customer portfolio comprises several hundred industrial enterprises, municipal utility providers, distributors, power plant operators and commercial and service companies. natGAS also boasts an excellent international position. Apart from Germany, the company is active in France, Belgium, Switzerland, Austria and Italy. For more information about our product and service spectrum or about natGAS AG, please feel free to call us or send us an e-mail. We would be pleased to talk to you personally!

Company description: HIGHVOLT Prüftechnik Dresden GmbH is a prominent manufacturer specializing in high-voltage and high-current testing systems, with a focus on the testing of energy cables, transformers, and various electrical transmission devices. As a member of the Reinhausen Group, HIGHVOLT is dedicated to facilitating the transition to sustainable energy systems through innovative products and digital solutions that support grid expansion. The company's mission emphasizes the integration of sustainability goals into its corporate strategy, striving for a balance between decarbonization and profitability while actively contributing to the global energy transition. HIGHVOLT serves a diverse clientele, including energy providers and manufacturers who are committed to building and operating sustainable energy infrastructures. The company is particularly focused on developing innovative testing systems for high-voltage direct current (HVDC) cables and transformers, primarily at the primary distribution level. This focus is crucial in enhancing the reliability and efficiency of energy transmission systems, especially in light of the increasing demand for renewable energy sources. Collaboration is key to HIGHVOLT's approach, as the company works closely with research institutions, universities, and industry partners to drive technological innovations and establish standards in high-voltage testing and monitoring. Its target market encompasses cable manufacturers, energy providers, and transmission system operators, particularly those engaged in large-scale projects such as the 525 kV HVDC transmission systems. Additionally, through its monitoring solution, HiMON, HIGHVOLT actively collects field data to continuously refine its technology and application portfolio, addressing challenges related to long cable lengths and the necessity for effective condition assessment. With a strong commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, HIGHVOLT aims to set benchmarks for the future of the energy industry.

Company description: Co2online gGmbH is a non-profit organization based in Berlin, established in 2003, dedicated to promoting energy efficiency and climate protection in Germany. The company focuses on empowering consumers and businesses to reduce their carbon footprint through interactive online tools and expert advisory services. Co2online's mission is to facilitate the energy transition by providing data-driven, actionable advice that helps users identify and implement energy-saving and modernization measures. With over 20 years of experience in climate communication, Co2online has reached millions of individuals, assisting them in lowering their energy costs and making sustainable choices. The organization serves a diverse clientele, including private households, tenants, businesses, and public institutions, all of whom are seeking to enhance their sustainability practices. Co2online collaborates closely with a wide range of partners, including municipalities, energy providers, and specialized service companies, to expand the reach of its services and amplify its messages on energy efficiency. By leveraging technology and data analytics, Co2online aims to create a more energy-efficient society and raise awareness about the importance of climate action. Co2online's initiatives, such as the "VierWende" online community, foster collaboration and knowledge sharing among users, encouraging them to engage in impactful climate measures. The organization also influences policy frameworks to enhance the effectiveness of climate action, ensuring that its efforts contribute to broader environmental goals. Through its commitment to effective climate protection, Co2online envisions a future where consumers actively participate in sustainable living, ultimately contributing to a healthier planet.

Industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Oil & Energy, Telecommunications, Utilities
Company description: Svorka er et energiselskap på Indre Nordmøre med egne datterselskaper for produksjon av strøm, bredbånds- og TV-løsninger, samt el-installasjon. Selskapets hovedkontor ligger i Surnadal på Nordmøre og har ca. 100 medarbeidere og en årlig omsetning på ca. 280 millioner kroner. Svorka er en bedrift i stadig utvikling. Vi er opptatt av å endre oss i takt med samfunnet, på en måte som kommer både våre eiere, ansatte og ikke minst kundene til gode. Selskapet er veldrevet, og kan vise til solid økonomi og en stabil kundemasse. Leveringssikkerheten er høy, og både bygg og anlegg er i god stand. Samtidig er selskapet en konkurransedyktig strømleverandør både i lokalt marked og på landsbasis. Svorka har stabile og lojale ansatte som samlet sett representerer høy kompetanse innen dagens virksomhetsområder. Og uansett hva vi jobber med er det å sette kunden i fokus viktig. Vi tar et aktivt samfunnsansvar, og vårt overskudd går direkte tilbake til lokalsamfunnet i form av skatter, arbeidsplasser, utbytte og lokal støtte til lag og foreninger. Svorka ønsker å være her for deg, både i dag og i fremtiden. Derfor vil vi fortsette å utvikle oss også i årene som kommer. Til alles beste.

Als onafhankelijke energieadviseur ondersteunen wij al twintig jaar bij het tegengaan van energieverspilling, verduurzamen van organisaties en het besparen van energiekosten. De snel veranderende energiemarkt, gestelde klimaatdoelstellingen, wettelijke eisen en constante telefoontjes van energieleveranciers leveren menig ondernemer kopzorgen op. Company description: Pohjolan Voima Oyj is one of Finland's largest energy producers, responsible for approximately 20% of the nation's total electricity generation. The company specializes in the production of electricity and heat through a diverse portfolio that includes hydropower, thermal power, and nuclear power. With a total electricity production capacity of 2,889 MW and a heat production capacity of 1,089 MW, Pohjolan Voima plays a crucial role in ensuring a reliable and adjustable energy supply for its shareholders, which include Finnish industrial operators and local energy companies. The company operates under the Mankala principle, providing energy to its shareholders at cost price, which fosters collaboration and supports regional economic vitality. Pohjolan Voima is committed to sustainability, with a mission to achieve carbon neutrality in its operations. As of 2024, 99% of its electricity and 89% of its heat production were carbon neutral, reflecting its dedication to climate change mitigation. The company is currently exploring the development of a pumped storage hydropower station in the Kemijärvi area, known as the PUHTI project, which aims to enhance electricity storage and ensure a stable energy supply as Finland's electricity consumption is expected to double in the next 15 years. The company actively engages with various stakeholders, including local communities, environmental organizations, and its shareholders, to ensure that its operations align with environmental standards and community needs. Pohjolan Voima's sustainability strategy aligns with several UN Sustainable Development Goals, focusing on carbon neutrality, biodiversity, and responsible stakeholder engagement. The company serves a diverse clientele, including 23 industrial companies and municipal energy providers, fostering collaboration to achieve shared energy goals while promoting ecological and financial sustainability. Pohjolan Voima is recognized for its excellent workplace culture, achieving a TrustIndex score of 95% and a Great Place to Work certificate, which reflects its commitment to employee development and well-being. Through ongoing projects and partnerships, the company aims to enhance biodiversity and promote the circular economy, ensuring a sustainable future for both the energy sector and the communities it serves.

The company serves a diverse clientele, including large enterprises and families, and partners with various organizations to promote energy efficiency and sustainability initiatives. Company description: La nostra storia inizia nel 2012 a La Spezia con l’evoluzione di SPIGAS S.r.l., una delle realtà italiane più importanti nella gestione nazionale e internazionale della logistica gas. In poco tempo cresciamo e diventiamo il principale fornitore di energia elettrica, gas e sistemi di efficientamento energetico delle Province di La Spezia e Massa-Carrara. La presenza sul territorio e la vicinanza alle persone che lo abitano sono da sempre i nostri punti di forza; per questo negli anni la nostra rete è cresciuta in modo capillare e oggi ci trovi nei comuni di La Spezia, Sarzana, Levanto, Ceparana, Aulla, Pontremoli, Marina di Carrara, Carrara, Deiva Marina e Brugnato. Il nostro tratto distintivo è il rapporto diretto e trasparente con la clientela, famiglie, imprese e condomini che scelgono di rivolgersi a noi; una relazione basata sulla fiducia, la competenza e la cortesia dei dipendenti, gli operatori di sportello e i consulenti della rete commerciale. Attenzione al Cliente e ascolto dei suoi bisogni, personalizzazione del servizio offerto, attaccamento al territorio, costruzione di sinergie e partnership con le realtà locali: sono i punti fermi che ci guidano e che ci spingono a tenere alta la fiducia di chi sceglie Spigas Clienti come proprio partner e fornitore. Crescere in modo sostenibile con la crescita del territorio: è questo, secondo noi, il primo passo per diventare il fornitore locale di energia di riferimento. Siamo da sempre parte del Gruppo Canarbino e crediamo nell’importanza di uno sviluppo sostenibile, sia dal punto di vista ambientale sia sociale ed economico. Per continuare su questo percorso, dal 1° ottobre 2024, siamo diventati un brand di Segnoverde SpA Unipersonale. Siamo sempre noi: la proprietà, il gruppo, le persone, la convenienza e l’attenzione al Cliente sono gli stessi. Con questa evoluzione si apre un altro importante capitolo della nostra storia, che segue l’introduzione e la vendita di sistemi di efficientamento energetico.

Zendure envisions becoming a leading Clean EnergyTech platform that supports communities and families in their transition to sustainable energy practices. The company targets environmentally conscious consumers, families, and small businesses looking to minimize their carbon footprint and enhance energy efficiency. Zendure's products are designed for easy installation and compatibility with a wide range of solar technologies, making them accessible to a diverse clientele. Through strategic partnerships with various stakeholders in the solar energy sector, Zendure ensures that its offerings are efficient and compatible with numerous solar panels and microinverters. By popularizing cutting-edge EnergyTech, Zendure aims to accelerate a sustainable future and empower users to adopt renewable energy solutions in their daily lives. The company's commitment to quality and innovation positions it as a key player in the renewable energy market, driving the adoption of clean energy solutions globally. Through its efforts, Zendure is not only enhancing energy independence for households but also contributing to a more sustainable and environmentally friendly future.

Company description: WEPTECH Elektronik GmbH is an innovative company based in Landau, specializing in the development and manufacturing of electronic solutions, particularly in the fields of smart metering and wireless communication. With over 25 years of experience, WEPTECH is committed to contributing to the digitalization and energy transition through modern technologies. The company serves a diverse range of clients, including energy providers and industrial enterprises, and collaborates closely with partners such as Deutsche Telekom and various technology providers. WEPTECH places a strong emphasis on quality and safety, as evidenced by the certification of its products by the Federal Office for Information Security (BSI). The company has also achieved ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 certifications, highlighting its dedication to excellence and sustainability. WEPTECH's mission is to enhance the efficiency and reliability of electronic systems, while its vision is to play a leading role in the digital transformation of the energy sector through innovative solutions and sustainable practices. The company focuses on developing cost-effective and customized applications for smart metering and environmental monitoring, utilizing advanced wireless communication technologies like wireless MBus and OMS transceivers. By actively collaborating with partners in the OMS Group, WEPTECH integrates various consumption meters into cohesive systems, ensuring seamless operation and improved data management. Through its commitment to innovation and quality, WEPTECH Elektronik GmbH aims to support the energy transition and foster a sustainable environment for future generations.

Company description: Solar Energy Group Spa specializes in providing innovative solar energy solutions, focusing on photovoltaic systems and energy storage solutions for residential clients. The company's mission is to empower homeowners to achieve energy independence and sustainability through efficient solar energy systems, enabling them to significantly reduce their reliance on the grid and lower their electricity bills. With offerings like E.ON SuperSolar, which includes comprehensive services from feasibility analysis to installation and technical support, Solar Energy Group Spa aims to make solar energy accessible and affordable. The company targets residential customers across Italy, partnering with various stakeholders to deliver tailored financing options and incentives, such as tax deductions and bonuses, to enhance the affordability of solar installations. Through its commitment to sustainability and customer satisfaction, Solar Energy Group Spa is dedicated to leading the transition towards renewable energy in the residential sector.

Company description: 𝐅𝐮𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐟 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 Fuel retailers face numerous challenges, including the energy transition, changing customer behavior, technological changes, and advanced mobility solutions. How does this disruption impact stations and convenience stores? ICASA supports retailers in making their stations future-proof and in efficiently managing their retail networks by guiding them through these changes and enabling them to evolve from energy suppliers to mobility providers. All while using a secure and reliable cloud solution. 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢 𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐜𝐥𝐨𝐮𝐝 𝐬𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 ICASA has more than 30 years of experience in the energy industry and is a major player with its fully integrated end-to-end cloud solution for energy, mobility and convenience management, covering all types of energy (petrol, gas, hydrogen, EV charging). From the Belgian headquarters we service our global customer base. Moreover, we have strong local partners to support our global customers in their respective markets. Need help in getting your stations future-proof? Just reach out and we would be more than happy to explain how we can support you in overcoming any multi-energy challenges you may be facing.

Company description: Greenergy is an energy service company specializing in small-scale combined heat and power plants and renewable energy projects. With over 11 years of international experience, we aim to be a leading supplier in Central Europe's clean-tech market. Partnering with 19 entities in Hungary, we possess a power capacity of over 60 MWe and 82 MWt of installed thermal energy capacity since 2002. Our focus lies in combined heat and power generation, with an emphasis on wind and biomass power plants for future investments. With a team of 52 dedicated employees, we ensure seamless operations to deliver clean power and cost-effective thermal energy to our partners. A Greenergy egy energia-szolgáltató vállalat, amely kis méretű kombinált hő- és áramtermelőket és megújuló energiára alapuló projekteket fejleszt és üzemeltet. Több mint 11 éves nemzetközi tapasztalattal rendelkezünk, és célunk, hogy vezető szállítóként jelenjünk meg a Közép-Európa tiszta technológiai piacán. Magyarországon 19 partnerrel működünk együtt, és 2002 óta több mint 60 MWe teljesítményű villamosenergia-termelő kapacitással és 82 MWt telepített hőenergia-kapacitással büszkélkedhetünk. Tevékenységünk elsősorban kombinált hő- és áramtermelésre összpontosít, a jövőbeli beruházásoknál pedig elsőbbséget élveznek a szél- és biomasszaerőművek. 52 elkötelezett munkatársunk segítségével biztosítjuk a zavartalan működést, hogy tiszta energiát és költséghatékony hőenergiát szállíthassunk partnereinknek.

Company description: We help utilities turn energy data into something people actually understand and use. Eliq started in Sweden in 2016 with a simple goal: to help people make sense of their energy usage. What began as a small team working with a single utility is now a platform used across 15+ markets – supporting millions of households and some of Europe’s most ambitious energy providers. We’re not here to sell dashboards. We’re here to help utilities stay relevant – by making energy feel less like a black box, and more like something customers can control, learn from, and act on. That means fewer calls. Lower churn. Smarter operations. Stronger relationships. But more than anything, it means closing the gap between data and real-life impact.

Industries: Business Services, Information Technology And Services, Research, Telecommunications
Company description: NET CHECK GmbH is a leading provider of comprehensive solutions for mobile and fixed network performance measurement, optimization, and benchmarking. The company is dedicated to enhancing connectivity and user experience across various sectors, including telecommunications, public transport, and critical infrastructures. With a mission to improve network quality and customer satisfaction, NET CHECK employs advanced methodologies and state-of-the-art technology to conduct thorough analyses and provide actionable insights. Their clientele includes mobile network operators, public transport authorities, and organizations requiring secure communication solutions, such as emergency services.  NET CHECK specializes in innovative technologies that enhance the reliability and security of communication networks. This includes advanced monitoring and testing solutions for TETRA digital radio systems, intelligent localization services for real-time tracking of people and objects, and proactive monitoring of passive optical network infrastructures. The company is committed to delivering high-performance systems tailored to the unique needs of critical infrastructure sectors, including government security agencies, private energy suppliers, and transportation companies.  With a strong focus on quality, NET CHECK is ISO 9001 certified, reflecting its commitment to continuously improving processes and services to meet the highest standards of excellence. The company also strengthens its market position through strategic partnerships, such as its collaboration with the magazine CHIP for benchmarking reports and the recent acquisition of Focus Infocom, which enhances its capabilities in mobile network optimization. Through these efforts, NET CHECK aims to set industry standards and drive innovation in network performance evaluation, ensuring that it remains at the forefront of the telecommunications landscape.

Industries: Information Technology And Services, Renewables & Environment, Research
Company description: Greenventory is a pioneering company dedicated to facilitating the energy transition for businesses, municipalities, and energy suppliers through innovative software solutions and expert consulting. Specializing in identifying and optimizing energy potentials for renewable sources, particularly in large facilities such as factories and residential buildings, Greenventory utilizes a modular software platform that provides tailored energy analyses and roadmaps for sustainable energy integration. The company's mission is to empower clients to make informed decisions that align with the Energiedienstleistungsgesetz, ensuring compliance and promoting climate neutrality.  Greenventory collaborates with a diverse range of partners, including renowned institutions like Fraunhofer ISE and KIT, to leverage cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights. Its target market encompasses housing associations, retail chains, corporations, and municipal utilities, all of whom are increasingly committed to sustainable energy practices. As a spinoff from two research institutes, Greenventory aims to create a sustainable future by leveraging technical expertise to analyze energy demand and renewable potential, enabling the planning of both small and large-scale energy projects. Through its comprehensive approach, Greenventory accelerates the implementation of renewable energy projects and contributes to a greener future. The company works closely with a network of specialized partners to ensure that clients receive tailored advice and proposals based on their specific energy needs. With a steadfast commitment to sustainability and excellence, Greenventory inspires others to adopt efficient energy practices and actively contribute to a greener planet.

Company description: Empower Your Home with Modular Energy Storage As a leading home energy storage provider, we specialize in modular battery systems that offer reliable and efficient energy solutions for residences. Our innovative products are designed to store electricity from solar panels or the grid, providing homes with clean backup power and energy independence. By combining high-quality lithium batteries with smart software and safety features, our modular systems can be easily customized to match each household's energy needs. Our storage solutions come in different sizes and can be scaled up by adding more modules. This flexibility allows homeowners to start small and expand storage capacity over time. We are committed to facilitating the transition to renewable energy one home at a time. Our user-friendly modular battery systems make home energy storage simple and accessible. With customizable capacity and intelligent controls, we empower families to reduce energy bills, prepare for outages, and achieve energy sustainability. Contact us today to learn how our modular energy storage solutions can help your home optimize renewable power, reduce reliance on the grid, and gain energy resilience.

Technologies: Upstream, Office 365, Power Automate, Microsoft Exchange, User Adoption, OneDrive, Sharepoint, ASSET, ICT, Microsoft, Onboard, R, Sympa HR, Linkedin, Open Graph, Facebook, X-Content-Type-Options, Google Plus, Pinterest, X-XSS-Protection, JSON-LD, Microsoft 365, jQuery, Apple iCloud Mail, Destinet, Google Analytics, Twitter, HSTS
Company description: Petoro AS is a Norwegian state-owned company established in 2001, tasked with managing the State's Direct Financial Interest (SDFI) in oil and gas licenses on Norway's continental shelf. The company’s primary mission is to maximize the financial value generated from the SDFI portfolio, which accounts for approximately one-third of Norway's total oil and gas reserves. Petoro is dedicated to ensuring that the revenues from these resources benefit the entire nation, significantly contributing to the Government Pension Fund Global. The company operates under the guidance of the Ministry of Petroleum and Energy, focusing on sustainable and responsible management of its substantial oil and gas assets. Petoro collaborates closely with major industry players, particularly Equinor ASA, to market and sell petroleum products, optimizing the management of significant oil and gas fields such as Johan Sverdrup and Troll. The company emphasizes operational efficiency and safety while navigating the challenges of the energy transition, aiming to maintain Norway's role as a reliable energy supplier to Europe. Petoro is committed to reducing greenhouse gas emissions through initiatives like electrification, with a target of achieving a 55% reduction by 2030. The company primarily serves the Norwegian government and stakeholders in the energy sector, focusing on the European gas market for its sales and trading activities. Petoro's strategic priorities include maturing fields, area development, and addressing environmental concerns, positioning it as a key player in the transition to a low-emission society. Through its governance and operational efficiency, Petoro aims to create long-term value for the state while contributing positively to the climate agenda and ensuring economic stability for Norway.

Company description: HHK Datentechnik GmbH is a leading provider of innovative software solutions specializing in surveying and geoinformation since 1984. The company is dedicated to enhancing efficiency and precision in various sectors, including civil engineering, mechanical engineering, real estate, administration, and planning. With a mission to deliver tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of surveying and engineering firms, land registries, energy providers, and municipalities, HHK aims to drive success through advanced technology and expertise. The company actively engages with its clients and partners through events like the Norddeutschen Fachtage, fostering networking and knowledge exchange in the geodetic and geoinformatics fields. HHK's commitment to innovation and inter-disciplinary collaboration positions it as a trusted partner in navigating the complexities of modern geospatial applications.

Company description: Stedin Meetbedrijf is een betrouwbaar en ondernemend meetbedrijf van nationaal formaat. Op de markten voor gas en elektriciteit vormt Stedin Meetbedrijf een belangrijke schakel in de dynamiek tussen eindverbruikers, netbeheerders en energieleveranciers. In opdracht van tal van bedrijven en overheidsinstellingen realiseert Stedin Meetbedrijf een efficiënte verwerking van meetgegevens.  Actueel en duidelijk inzicht in uw meetgegevens stelt u in staat om uw energiefactuur te controleren en tijdig in te spelen op onvoorziene pieken in uw energieverbruik. Deze mogelijkheid begint met de keuze van een goed meetbedrijf. Als organisatie bent u namelijk zelf verantwoordelijk voor een juiste meting van het energieverbruik en daarmee vrij in uw keuze aan wie u deze zogenaamde meetverantwoordelijkheid uitbesteedt.  Het team van Stedin Meetbedrijf draagt graag, en professioneel, zorg voor uw meetverantwoordelijkheid. Hierbij stellen wij een efficiënt gebruik van uw energiemeters voorop.

Company description: Goldenergy S.p.A. è molto più di un fornitore di energia: siamo la luce che illumina i tuoi momenti e il calore che rende unica ogni giornata. La nostra missione è semplice e ambiziosa: offrire soluzioni energetiche affidabili, sostenibili e su misura, mettendo sempre al centro le persone. Parte del Gruppo Goldengas S.p.A., realtà italiana con oltre 50 anni di esperienza nel settore, portiamo avanti una tradizione di fiducia, innovazione e vicinanza al cliente. Dall’esperienza maturata nella distribuzione di GPL, oggi ampliamo l’offerta con energia elettrica e gas naturale, accompagnando famiglie, imprese e professionisti verso un consumo più consapevole, efficiente e conveniente. Crediamo nell’energia come strumento di connessione: non solo quella che alimenta case e aziende, ma anche quella che accende relazioni autentiche, empatia e collaborazione.  Grazie a un approccio personalizzato, tecnologie avanzate e consulenza dedicata, costruiamo soluzioni concrete per migliorare la qualità della vita e contribuire alla tutela dell’ambiente. Con Goldenergy scegli un partner trasparente, vicino e affidabile: perché l’energia non è solo ciò che usi, è ciò che vivi.

Technologies: oEmbed, MySQL, Nginx, OWL Carousel, jQuery Migrate, WordPress, RSS, X-Content-Type-Options, Priority Hints, Google Fonts API, Modernizr, NextGEN Gallery, PHP, MailChimp, MailChimp for WordPress, jQuery, WPML
Company description: SMART/LAB Innovationsgesellschaft mbH is a prominent IT service provider specializing in e-mobility, established in the early 2010s and headquartered in Aachen, Germany. The company focuses on developing comprehensive products and concepts for the operation and billing of charging infrastructure, catering to a diverse range of B2B clients, including car dealerships, hospitals, hotels, supermarkets, energy suppliers, and municipalities. Through its brands, ladebusiness and ladenetz.de, SMART/LAB is committed to advancing e-mobility across Europe by managing a unique network of energy suppliers, businesses, and roaming partners, overseeing over 390,000 charging points across the continent. The company's mission is to create a comprehensive and user-friendly network of charging stations that ensures interoperability with other market players, facilitating seamless electric vehicle charging experiences. SMART/LAB emphasizes continuous innovation, leveraging years of research and development to maintain its leadership position in the German and European markets. The company is dedicated to providing secure and efficient data processing services while ensuring compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other relevant legal frameworks, thereby empowering businesses with tailored solutions that enhance operational efficiency and safeguard personal data. SMART/LAB collaborates with various partners, including municipal utilities and energy suppliers, to deliver customized solutions that meet the evolving needs of electric vehicle users. The company’s strategic partnerships, such as its recent collaboration with DKV Mobility, aim to enhance service offerings and expand the charging network further. With a strong emphasis on practical implementation and user experience, SMART/LAB leverages insights from funded research projects to drive advancements in sustainable mobility. Through its initiatives, the company is dedicated to promoting accessibility and efficiency in electric mobility, contributing to a greener future and fostering trust and transparency in the digital landscape.

Company description: MAC Srl is a pioneering company in the energy industry, dedicated to providing innovative solutions for residential clients and small businesses. The company’s mission is to empower users to monitor and manage their energy consumption effectively, significantly reducing energy bills and preventing blackouts caused by overloads. With its flagship platform, Chain2Gate Energy Aware, MAC Srl offers a user-friendly, plug-and-play solution tailored for the Italian market, as well as an energy meter for international contexts. The company’s products, including smart plugs and energy management systems, enable real-time monitoring and active management of energy loads, resulting in an average energy savings of 15% and a 100% reduction in blackouts. MAC Srl targets communities transitioning to energy efficiency and electric mobility, positioning itself as a key player in the development of smart energy solutions.

Company description: Being there for people is what Travvant stands for. Whether you count on us for outplacement, career counseling or inplacement, we always put you first. With this customized approach, we try to make a difference every day. Together we hone talents, build job happiness and look for a match between people.  Today we sail a clear, national, niche-oriented course with a team of +25 experienced and certified consultants at Travvant. *Outplacement* There's no match with one of your employees? Through outplacement you can look for the best solution for both employee and employer. After dismissal, we take care of your employee as well as possible, provide tailor-made guidance and then launch him or her smoothly back into the job market. *Career guidance* As an organization, you can encourage your employees to take the future of their careers into their own hands. That way, you will motivate them, work on their resilience and adaptability, stimulate internal mobility and contribute to wellbeing in the workplace. A win-win for both employee and employer. *Inplacement* We also offer guidance about internal mobility. We help your employees broaden their horizons and find interests, passions and room for development. Besides we check what their energy providers and takers are. That allows your company to put the right talents in the right place.

Company description: Elettragas è una realtà emergente che opera con passione e successo come fornitore di gas naturale nel libero mercato dell'energia. Accreditata nel 2011 presso l'A.E.G.G., la Società nasce totalmente indipendente da gruppi nazionali e multinazionali. Questa autonomia si traduce nella possibilità strategica di acquistare gas dai migliori grossisti ed alle migliori condizioni di mercato, con indiscusso beneficio per il cliente finale. L'offerta di Elettragas è differenziata per segmento commerciale e si rivolge a tutte le tipologie di utenza, dai grandi gruppi industriali alle piccole e medie imprese, dai condomini alle abitazioni private. Grazie alla sua rete di partnership e collaborazioni, Elettragas riesce a coprire quasi tutto il territorio nazionale: Abruzzo; Emilia Romagna; Lazio; Lombardia; Marche; Molise; Puglia; Toscana; Umbria; Veneto. L'Azienda si basa su una struttura snella, composta da figure professionali con background complementari e funzionali al perseguimento della qualità del servizio offerto. Il fattore di successo di Elettragas è quindi rappresentato da un mix vincente che unisce competenza e professionalità ad una realtà giovane e dinamica, interamente dedicata alla soddisfazione del cliente.

Company description: ALLPLAN GmbH was founded in Vienna in 1967. Since then our former technical bureau for heating, ventilation and air conditioning has become an international consulting firm in the fields of technical building services as well as energy and environmental management. A team of experts in various technical fields and external specialists are at your disposal. Comprehensive EDV/CAD/GIS-systems enable calculations and simulations in different technical fields. ALLPLAN employees dispose – in addition to technical expertise – of a long and comprehensive experience in project development and project management. Our company works together with the experts of the austrian universities (for instance Vienna University of Technology as well as with the institutes and associations as mentioned below). Most of our international projects are carried out in Central and Eastern Europe. In the fields of energy and environment we are worldwide active. We are pleased to count to our customers: -International financial institutes (World Bank, EBRD or supporting programs of EU) -Industrial Enterprises -Owners of energy projects (wind energy park founders, water power stations, depot owners etc.) -Energy suppliers -Ministries of Central and Eastern Europe -Communities -Austrian Development Organisations Our experts solve complex problems on basis of the technical background; they consider and include business management as well as legal and financial aspects. Various Know-How carriers meet together in the center of this network and develop entire solutions during the process. As environmental managers of ALLPLAN we take over full corporate responsibility for the project and stay in direct contact with our customers. We provide a comprehensive consultation and follow-up during all phases of the project. Clearly defined steps of the project enable us to work out the goal, the planning and the realization of the project in continuous cooperation with our customers.

Company description: Ventum Wij zijn een energieleverancier met een missie. Het leveren van energie gaat bij ons namelijk gepaard met het leveren van een warm gevoel. Door onze vernieuwende blik en duidelijke visie kunnen wij uw cliënt en uzelf een zo optimaal mogelijke service bieden. Partner portaal Wanneer u voor Ventum gekozen heeft als energieleverancier krijgt u toegang tot ons klanten- en partnerportaal. Deze portalen dienen er toe u een helder en overzichtelijk inzicht te geven in de gegevens van uw cliënten. 100% Acceptatie In Nederland hoort niemand zonder energie te zitten, iedereen verdient een warm gevoel. Daarom hanteren wij geen waarborgsom en beloven wij scherpe tarieven te bieden. Hierbij gaan wij vooral uit van onze kernwaarden: vertrouwen, respect en gemak. Beste prijs Ventum is voor iedereen en zo ook onze scherpe tarieven. Zo kunt u direct gaan besparen op uw huidige energie rekening. Snelle service Bij significante afwijkingen informeren wij u proactief. Ziet u toch iets wat u niet thuis kunt brengen of komt u er zelf niet uit? Op onze website vindt u antwoord op de meest gestelde vragen. Wij zijn natuurlijk ook bereikbaar via social media of telefonisch zonder lange wachttijden! Wij zijn iedere werkdag telefonisch bereikbaar van 08:00 tot 21:00 uur op telefoonnummer 088-2000 400. Per e-mail kunt u ons te allen tijde bereiken op klantenservice@ventum.nl en ontvangt u binnen 60 minuten een reactie.

The company is dedicated to building a sustainable and reliable electrical future for Lapland, focusing on long-term investments in its infrastructure to ensure efficient energy distribution. With a mission to provide cost-effective electricity solutions to over 32,000 customers, Rovakaira emphasizes community engagement and environmental responsibility, actively working to minimize its ecological footprint while enhancing energy efficiency for its clients.  Rovakaira specializes in electricity distribution and network construction services, catering to a diverse clientele that includes municipalities and local businesses. The company collaborates with various partners, including local municipalities and energy suppliers, to adapt to the evolving energy market and regulatory landscape, ensuring a stable and secure energy supply for the future. With a strong commitment to reliability and customer-centric solutions, Rovakaira aims to maintain high standards in energy distribution while continuously developing and improving its services.  The company’s innovative approach to technology and infrastructure development positions it as a key player in the energy sector, dedicated to meeting the evolving needs of its customers and contributing to a sustainable energy future in Lapland. Through its weather-resistant network and focus on energy efficiency, Rovakaira is not only enhancing the quality of life for its residents but also paving the way for a greener tomorrow.

Company description: The future is green! 🌱 At Biolectric, we produce and build micro AD plants that turn cow and pig slurry into green energy. Biomethane or Electricity & Heat. The farmer can choose his output. It takes just three cows to power a family with clean energy for a whole year. With methane emission reductions of up to 82%, we deliver green power, lower electricity bills, and a smaller carbon footprint – all while ensuring no cows are harmed. It’s a true win-win for farmers and the planet. We’re shaping the future of agriculture by offering solutions for sustainable energy and efficient local waste management. Since 2011, we've helped farmers become more independent, future-proof their farms, and enhance the nutritional value of their digestate. With partners across Europe and beyond, we're setting a new standard for the farming and energy sectors. For more information, visit our website: www.biolectric.com

Company description: Romagna Energia è nata come consorzio il 22 Dicembre 1999, in concomitanza con la liberalizzazione del mercato elettrico, dall'associazione di grandi aziende della Romagna, in particolare del settore agro-alimentare; nel 2008, a seguito di un enorme sviluppo sia in termini di volume che, conseguentemente, di bilancio, è divenuta Romagna Energia Società Consortile.  Romagna Energia è un fornitore di energia elettrica e di gas naturale, si rivolge a tutte le imprese esistenti sul territorio italiano, alle cosiddette utenze "non civili".  A oggi è uno dei principali player del mercato energetico nazionale con 500 consorziati e oltre 2000 siti in fornitura (alta, media e bassa tensione), 1,5 miliardi di KWh di energia elettrica dispacciata e un fatturato di circa 191 milioni di euro (anno 2009).  Romagna Energia è il primo consorzio associativo italiano per punti di prelievo e il secondo per volumi di energia; è presente in tutte le regioni d'Italia ed è in continua crescita.  La società è senza scopo di lucro con obiettivo di bilancio zero attraverso ristorni sulla tariffa dell' energia. I soci sono rappresentati dai consumatori stessi, a differenza della maggior parte delle società di vendita presenti sul mercato; l'utente finale non rappresenta solamente un semplice cliente, ma diventa socio di un progetto per fornire energia e servizi di elevata qualità, utilizzando le tecnologie più efficienti e compatibili con l'ambiente.  L'attività di Romagna Energia in ambito energetico non si limita alla sola fornitura di energia e gas, ma offre anche capacità e conoscenze in ambito di fonti rinnovabili, autoproduzione, certificati verdi, ecc.

Company description: b-next AG is one of the world’s leading providers of corporate software in the capital markets trading surveillance and compliance sector. The corporation has around 70 employees. Its customer base in the finance sector includes, among others, renowned banks, brokers, supervisory bodies and energy suppliers. In the 30-year history of the company, several hundred customer projects have been successfully carried out. b-next is represented by its own branch offices in Germany, Great Britain and the United States. The slogan ‘SECURE | PROTECT | COMPLY’ stands for the company’s powerful and comprehensive solutions covering the entire spectrum of compliance requirements in the capital markets. b-next’s products help companies meet regulatory requirements and manage operational risks. The major value driver for b-next are the development of innovative, cloud-based applications as well as the use of artificial intelligence, in particular for a strategic approach to compliance.

Company description: Bij Xemex maken we energie slim. Al meer dan 25 jaar ontwikkelen wij technologie die energiestromen inzichtelijk, beheersbaar en duurzaam maakt. Vanuit onze vestigingen in Schoten (BE) en Rosmalen (NL) helpen we consumenten, bedrijven en energieleveranciers om hun energieverbruik te monitoren, optimaliseren en automatiseren. Onze oplossingen – zoals het Enny Energie Management Systeem (EMS), slimme meters en de modulaire Lewiz Gateway – geven realtime inzicht in verbruik en opwekking. Ze zorgen ervoor dat apparaten automatisch worden aangestuurd op basis van zonneproductie, batterijniveau of dynamische tarieven. Zo vergroten we de zelfconsumptie en verlagen we de energiekosten. Via ons open cloudplatform koppelen we eenvoudig met laadpalen, omvormers, batterijen, warmtepompen en andere slimme apparaten. Dit maakt het mogelijk om energie slim te sturen, zowel op woning- als wijkniveau. Onze technologie is flexibel en schaalbaar, en geschikt voor zowel residentiële als commerciële toepassingen. Duurzaamheid, innovatie en klantgerichtheid vormen de kern van ons werk. We geloven in een toekomst waarin iedereen zijn energieverbruik begrijpt en actief bijdraagt aan een groenere wereld. Of u nu één woning beheert of een compleet energienetwerk: met Xemex heeft u altijd grip op uw energie. Contact 📍 Schoten (BE) & Rosmalen (NL) 📞 +32 32 01 95 95 📧 info@xemex.eu 🌐 www.xemex.eu Slimmer met energie. Samen vooruit

Company description: 💻 Software has become an everyday tool in all aspects of life – business and private. We want to evaluate everything, whether KPI's, financial data, even our daily steps. Only our energy consumption is a black box, but especially there we need to take action. But without knowing our consumption, we cannot change our behavior. ⚡ It is our mission to make the management of the energy consumption so easy that it becomes a habit and a given for everyone – whether company or private household. This way, our data-driven intuitive solutions create real value and help utilities and their customers to effectively reduce their energy consumption and carbon footprint. 🌍 And we go one step further: with our AI-driven software, we not only bring transparency but intelligence into the data, delivering an automated, flexible tool that makes the digitalization of the energy industry a real opportunity for everyone involved. 🎯 As a specialist for energy management and visualization software since 2009 with a team of over 45 colleagues, we have been creating decisive added value for national und international energy suppliers as well as their corporate and private customers on their way to climate neutrality.

Company description: På Solinnovation tror vi på ett bättre sätt att generera el till privatpersoner, lantbrukare och företag, till en lägre kostnad samtidigt som det bidrar till en bättre miljö. ￼Solpaneler är det bästa och säkraste sättet att spara pengar. Produkterna som vi erbjuder tillverkas av välkända och världsledande företag. Vi erbjuder omfattande produkt- och produktionsgarantier. Utifrån din elförbrukning och tillgängliga takytor designar vi en anläggning efter dina behov. Vi tar hand om hela processen från projektering till nyckelfärdig solcellsanläggning.

Name: GESAM Gas & Luce
Locations: [Italy, Tuscany, Lucca, Viale Europa Angolo Via Nieri, 55100]
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Lucca, Viale Europa Angolo Via Nieri, 55100
Company description: Ti diamo il benvenuto nel mondo di GESAM Gas & Luce, da cinquant’anni, prima con Ge.SA.AM, poi con GESAM S.p.A. (attuale GESAM Reti S.p.A.), il principale brand energetico della città di Lucca. Forniamo da sempre gas naturale, energia elettrica e sistemi di efficientamento energetico a famiglie, imprese e condomini. Siamo partiti dalla Provincia di Lucca e nel tempo siamo cresciuti e abbiamo costruito una rete di sportelli, raggiungendo anche le Province di Pisa e Pistoia. La nostra storia inizia nel 1974 con GESA-AM, quando il Comune di Lucca rileva la rete di distribuzione del gas e diventa il principale fornitore di gas della città murata. Nel 1995 la società si trasforma in GESAM S.p.A. e nel 2003, con la liberalizzazione del mercato del gas, il ramo d’azienda della vendita del gas viene conferito a GESAM Gas S.p.A. Nel tempo la società evolve, cresce e si modifica, nell’assetto e nel parco prodotti offerto alla clientela, fino a diventare nel 2013 GESAM Gas & Luce S.p.A. Un interlocutore esperto, serio e affidabile; un punto di riferimento per migliaia di famiglie, imprese e condomini che affianca alla fornitura di gas naturale quella di energia elettrica e di prodotti ad alta efficienza (Caldaie a condensazione, Climatizzatori, Pompe di calore, Impianti fotovoltaici). Nel 2019 GESAM Gas & Luce entra a far parte del Gruppo Canarbino, tra i primi 10 player del mercato energetico italiano, e dal 1° ottobre 2024, come ultimo step evolutivo, GESAM Gas & Luce ha cambiato denominazione ed è diventata un brand di Segnoverde S.p.A. Unipersonale. Un percorso all’insegna della sostenibilità, centrale nella visione aziendale di GESAM Gas & Luce e del Gruppo Canarbino.

Cooperating with major partners, we developed tools that are considered the best in their field. NetVision is our longest standing product: a Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition (SCADA) system deployed in numerous South East European locations. Most notably, the software is deployed at the Croatian electricity hub, the National Dispatching Centre (NDC). There we have an IEC-based SCADA, History RDB, EMS, DS, GMS... In addition to electricity networks, we support gas, oil and water networks. Energy supply is being liberalised throughout Europe - a profitable opportunity that requires an effective Business Management process. ESBM stands for “Energy Supplier Business Manager”. It seamlessly interfaces to your Energy Market Operator and Distribution System Operator, as well as your Customers and your Accounting system.

Company description: Greenlink is a 500MW, 190km electricity interconnector stretching under the Irish Sea from Great Island in Co. Wexford, Ireland, to Pembroke in Wales, and is one Europe's most important infrastructure projects.   Greenlink comprises a subsea and underground high voltage direct current (HVDC) interconnector system and associated converter stations, and will link the existing electricity grids in Ireland and the UK, operated respectively by EirGrid and National Grid.   Greenlink is being developed by Greenlink Interconnector Limited, owned by Partners Group on behalf of its clients, and was recognised as a Project of Common Interest (PCI) by the EU.  The privately-financed project will stimulate inward investment and jobs, put downward pressure on consumers' electricity bills, enhance energy security and support the growth and integration of low carbon energy in Ireland and the UK.  Following financial close in March 2022, onshore construction works are now under way and the project is expected to be commissioned by the end of 2024.

Company description: Ustekveikja Energi AS er et selskap som omsetter elektrisk kraft til sluttbrukermarkedet. Kundemassen er i dag ca 2 Twh i Norge og Sverige. I tillegg til å være aktive i kraftmarkedet med krafthandel, driver vi forvaltning av produksjon og kraftrettigheter for kraftverk og kommuner.
