Company description: We digitise transformers and bring them online and connected for a safer energy transition. Oktogrid's technology allows electricity providers to add a digital interface to any transformer in less than ten minutes with no tooling needed. Our method gives non-invasive access to critical transformer and grid performance data in realtime making it possible to monitor, forecast, and react to local congestions and reduce cost of asset management. We effectively turn an energy challenge into a data science opportunity for electricity transmission and distribution companies to build data-driven organisations; enabling them to make new decisions in a new energy scenario for a cleaner future.

Company description: 🐙 Octopus Energy ist ein globaler Enertech-Pionier. Wir nutzen Technologie, um die Energiewende weltweit voranzutreiben und Kund*innen rund um den Globus 100 Prozent Ökostrom zu fairen Preisen zu bieten. Octopus Energy ist seit 2016 auf dem Markt und in neun Ländern operativ. 💚 Unsere Mission: Die globale Energiewende vorantreiben und einen Weltklasse-Service bieten 💚 Unser Credo: 100% Ökostrom zu fairen Konditionen 💚 Unser Ass im Ärmel: Unsere Energiemanagement-Plattform „Kraken“ Die etablierten Energieanbieter haben sich lange genug ausgeruht auf der Wechselträgheit ihrer Bestandskund*innen. Bei Octopus Energy stehen unsere Kund*innen im Mittelpunkt - bei allem, was wir tun. Und das meinen wir ernst! Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach neuen Kolleg*innen, die uns dabei helfen, unsere Mission voranzutreiben. Sorge gemeinsam mit uns dafür, dass das Thema grüne Energie die Aufmerksamkeit bekommt, die es verdient – als spannendes Themenfeld, ganz ohne erhobenen Zeigefinger. Das klingt gut? Name: Gudbrandsdal Energi AS
Technologies: WordPress, AWS, Digital Ocean, Office 365 Mail, CloudFlare, Google Font API, Webpack, Laravel, Bootstrap, cdnjs, Node.js, Microsoft 365, Google Fonts API, Tailwind CSS, Bing Ads, PHP, Microsoft Azure, jQuery, Google Tag Manager, Amazon Web Services, Google Analytics, Font Awesome, PWA, Microsoft Advertising, React, Sanity, Next.js, Nginx, Slick, Priority Hints, Mailgun, X-Content-Type-Options, X-XSS-Protection, Facebook, JSS, Open Graph, Facebook Pixel, Hotjar
Company description: Gudbrandsdal Energi er den lokale strømleverandøren som ble en nasjonal utfordrer til de store strømselskapene. Vi holder til på Vinstra i Gudbrandsdalen, og selskapet ble etablert allerede i 1916. I dag er vi blant de ti største kraftleverandørene i Norge med over 100.000 kunder.  Vi har alltid vært opptatt av at kundene våre ikke skal betale for mye for strømmen de bruker. Samtidig ser vi på det som vår plikt som strømleverandør å bidra til at vi bruker mindre strøm.  Ved å redusere strømforbruket sparer en både penger og miljøet. Det er en måte å leve mer bærekraftig på. Derfor har vi satt oss et hårete mål: Vi skal hjelpe våre kunder å bruke 30% mindre strøm.  For oss er det å redusere strømforbruket et lagarbeid for klimaet og bedre privatøkonomi. Teknologi gir oss gode verktøy for å redusere strømforbruket vårt. Men teknologi er ingenting verdt uten mennesker og vår evne til å ta de riktige valgene. I Gudbrandsdal Energi satser vi på mennesker som kan hjelpe deg. Det er ikke uten grunn at vi i en årrekke har hatt topplasseringer i kundetilfredshetsundersøkelser som Norsk kundebarometer (BI) og EPSI, og kan skilte med å være landets mest prisbelønte strømleverandør. Det er fornøyde kunder vi lever av og for. Company description: Netrisk Group is a leading and fast-growing fintech company in the CEE.  Netrisk Group’s goal is to empower Customers to make the right financial choices and to save them money across insurance, banking, telecom, and utility verticals.    With the help of our 1100 dedicated and passionate coworkers, Netrisk operates in 6 markets (Austria, Czech Republic, Hungary, Lithuania, Poland and Slovakia). We aim to create a challenging, friendly, equal-opportunity, and fun environment enabling our coworkers to excel professionally and personally.  Our digital platforms, proprietary solutions, and dedicated professional teams enable millions of people to make easier, smarter, and better decisions regarding insurance, banking, telecom, and utility products. Our online supermarkets offer independent and transparent comparison based on price, quality, product features, and benefits. We work hard to provide comparison and save money for our Customers. The opportunity – and our ability – to support our Customers with their crucial decisions is our passion. We work hard to earn our customer’s trust each day, with each purchase. We are honored by the millions of comparisons that our clients trust us with.  Over time, Netrisk Group has built strong and trustworthy relations with hundreds of prominent insurers, service providers, telecom carriers, banks, energy providers, and utilities. We work hard with our business partners to deliver the broadest product comparison on the market and to match their quality products with our huge client base.  We’re eager not only to maintain our position as a trusted partner but to continuously develop our people, technologies, and processes in order to drive more impact and to serve better our Customers and communities where we operate.  We are also proud to drive profitable growth and deliver exceptional results to our Shareholders who are supporting us in our journey.

Company description: Willkommen in einem Unternehmen, das schon heute an der Zukunft arbeitet. Grüner Strom aus jeder Steckdose, saubere Luft in allen Großstädten? Als einer der führenden Energieanbieter Bayerisch-Schwabens tragen wir mit unseren Produkten und Ideen aber bereits jetzt dazu bei, den aktuellen und zukünftigen Herausforderungen in Sachen Klimaschutz zu begegnen und die global gesteckten Ziele erfolgreich umzusetzen. Und auch ein bisschen stolz machen. Company description: Elcor Sverige AB specializes in energy and electrical infrastructure, providing reliable, scalable, and future-ready solutions for the global energy sector. With 13 high-performing production sites across Northern Europe, the company delivers certified switchgear and control systems that power everything from local substations to national power grids and renewable energy projects. Elcor's mission is to enable energy providers and utilities to build robust and efficient networks that meet future demands while supporting the green transition. Their expertise includes AC/DC power supply, protection relays, and smart grid automation, ensuring reduced energy loss and compliance with ESG targets. Serving a diverse clientele that includes utilities, grid operators, and renewable energy projects, Elcor is committed to delivering modular, type-tested solutions backed by 24/7 service availability, making them a trusted partner in the evolving energy landscape.

Company description: Siamo una società di Vendita di Gas Naturale ed Energia Elettrica operante in Alto Adige. Nasciamo nel 2002 con lo scopo di rispondere alla crescente domanda di energia nel territorio e lo facciamo decidendo di offrire al mercato del riscaldamento locale uno dei combustibili più efficienti ed eco-compatibili: il Gas Naturale. La nostra maturità passa attraverso diverse fasi societarie e all’espansione della fornitura di Gas non solo al segmento domestico ma anche all’industria e ai servizi. Nel recente 2017 decidiamo di ampliare la nostra gamma di servizi anche alla fornitura di Energia Elettrica, completando quindi la nostra definizione di Fornitore di Energia in Italia. La propensione ad offrire i propri servizi in Alto Adige è dettata dalla nostra decennale esperienza sul mercato energetico locale, rispettandone le tradizioni e le sensibilità. Il forte radicamento sul territorio si riflette anche sulla struttura della nostra proprietà. Siamo una società locale affidabile per un’efficiente fornitura di Gas ed Energia Elettrica. Ci contraddistinguiamo per il forte orientamento al Cliente, perché la Sua soddisfazione è la Nostra fonte di energia.

Company description: One Bill Global streeft ernaar om uw leven te vereenvoudigen door diensten die je dagelijks gebruikt te combineren. Dit op vlak van volgende diensten: Mobiel De tarieven van onze mobiele abonnementen sluiten perfect aan bij de filosofie van One Bill Global: niet betalen voor wat je niet nodig hebt. Ons mobiel aanbod laten we volledig aansluiten op uw noden. Energie (Residentieel) Voor elektriciteit en gas voor residentiële klanten werkt One Bill Global samen met Mega, een duurzame en goedkopere energieleverancier in België.  Energie (B2B) OBG werkt ook B2B. Hiervoor werken we samen met Enbro. Als onafhankelijk tussenpersoon garandeert Enbro u de best mogelijke deal op de markt. Solar One Bill Global werkt samen met Earth om een uniek product op de Belgische markt te brengen: zonnepanelen op huurbasis. Ontdek snel ons huurmodel: alles voor jou geregeld door OBG en Earth. Onmiddellijk gebruik van uw zonnepanelen en een onmiddellijke besparing op uw energiefactuur. - One Bill Global aspire à faciliter la vie en combinant les services que vous utilisez quotidiennement.  Mobile Nos tarifs correspondent parfaitement à notre philosophie: ne pas payer pour ce dont on n’a pas besoin. Nous adaptons notre offre mobile complètement à vos besoins.  Energie (résidentiel) Pour l’électricité et le gaz pour nos clients résidentiels, OBG travaille en collaboration avec Mega, fournisseur d’énergie durable et surtout le moins cher en Belgique.   Energie (B2B) Pour les clients B2B pour l’électricité et le gaz, OBG travaille en collaboration avec Enbro. En sa qualité d’intermédiaire indépendant, Enbro vous garantit la meilleure offre possible du marché. Solaire OBG collabore Earth avec  pour mettre un produit unique sur le marché belge: des panneaux solaires en location! Découvrez rapidement notre modèle de location: tout est pris en charge par OBG et Earth, pour une utilisation  immédiate de vos panneaux et une économie considérable sur votre facture d’énergie.

Company description: Klimalnvest is one of the leading full-service energy and climate protection agencies for municipal utilities and energy suppliers in Germany. As a supplier of certified green electricity and green gas products, we have been offering customised solutions for climate protection strategies since 2009. Limiting global warming is one of the greatest challenges of our time. One of the key levers is the expansion of renewable energies and driving forward the energy transition. Energy supply companies in particular can make a major contribution to this. With well thought-out concepts and the utilisation of natural resources, we support over 500 energy suppliers on their way to greater climate protection. In our great team, we work every day with commitment and sustainability in the truest sense of the word to drive forward the energy transition and protect our climate. We share this intrinsic motivation, want to make a difference and help our customers on their way to the energy transition. Do you want that too? You can find our current job vacancies here: karriere.klima-invest.de Further information about KlimaInvest:  klima-invest.de instagram.com/klimainvest_green_concepts

Company description: HERITAGE AND EXPERIENCE Founded in Belgium since 1934, OSTA is an authentic manufacturer of pure wool and man-made fiber rugs. Our name is established by nearly 100 years of masterly excellence and experience in the weaving industry. The highly skilled in-house design team aspires to reinvent itself and refine the designs of today and tomorrow. The entire OSTA team strives to provide the best quality and services for our partnerships around the world. INNOVATION AND DESIGN  For almost 100 years we have specialized in outstanding Belgian design and innovation. The design studio is located in the heart of the showroom. It boasts a tremendous variety of materials, colors, yarns, as well as an extensive library from which to derive inspiration. KNOWLEDGE AND INNOVATION Our weaving mill is based in Avelgem, mere minutes away from Oudenaarde, which is Flanders’ historical tapestry weaving center. We are proud to continue the fine art of weaving and keep this remarkable legacy alive. Our team aspires to offer the widest possible scope of high-end techniques and textures, ranging from the sophisticated  Jaquard to high-end wilton. We achieve luxurious high pile, elegant cut and loop (commonly referred to as Brussels weave), and even intricate high-performance rugs. The finest materials are selected to weave our products, from natural fibres such as pure wool or cotton to even recycled polyester. OSTA highly values its in-house knowledge, and so the design team joins forces with our skilled master craftsmen to innovate and create the unexpected. RECYCLING AND ECOLOGY Sustainability is key in all our actions. We produce partly our own energy by solar panels which are placed throughout the roof of the factory. The remaining of the energy need is bought from an energy supplier which guarantees the origin from fully renewable power sources (wind and solar energy). And we have our textile waste, paper, cardboard, plastics, pallets, cartridges, batteries and many more recycled.

Industries: Information Technology And Services, Renewables & Environment
Company description: The Global Wind Energy Council (GWEC) helps open new markets for wind power.  GWEC has a proven track record of success in helping to build the wind power industry in emerging markets around the world, including China, Brazil, Mexico, South Africa, and India, and more recently, Mongolia, Argentina and Vietnam.    We work with national and international policy makers and industry associations to help ensure that wind power establishes itself as the answer to today’s energy challenges, providing substantial environmental and economic benefits. GWEC is a member-based trade association that represents the entire wind energy sector. The members of GWEC represent over 1,500 companies, organisations and institutions in more than 80 countries, including manufacturers, developers, component suppliers, research institutes, national wind and renewables associations, electricity providers, finance and insurance companies. Policy development: We represent the wind industry’s interests in international negotiations to ensure that wind power takes its place as a major energy source (IEA, IRENA, UN, etc). Global outreach: We work with local partners to help open up new markets, helping to create the policy environment for wind power to thrive across the world. Information and education: We provide authoritative information, analysis and data about the status of the industry globally, along with our expectations for the future. GWEC events: The meeting place for key wind sector players around the world… organised by the industry, for the industry…

Company description: Alens fornisce un servizio di consulenza a tutto tondo su tutti gli aspetti legati al mondo energetico, sostenibilità ambientale, impatto consumi, nella più assoluta indipendenza da fornitori di energia, fornitori di impianti, tecnologie ed ogni tipo di provider. Il nostro team di esperti si occupa di efficienza energetica all’interno del mercato delle commodities, con focus su energia elettrica e gas naturale.  Lavoriamo sia sul mercato italiano, sia sui mercati europei, con attenzione particolare ai paesi mediterranei.  ALENS opera anche come ESCo, consentendo ai propri clienti di efficientare i propri siti, senza alcun investimento economico. Tramite i propri partners, Alens è in grado di realizzare interventi di risparmio energetico, recuperando l'investimento sulla base dei risparmi economici generati al cliente.  Le formule contrattuali proposte sono quelle dell’ EPC contract - contratti a performance energetica.  Valutiamo tutte le tipologie di intervento, in particolare:  - impianti di illuminazione - cicli ORC - cogenerazioni - recuperi di calore   ALENS è ESCo certificata UNI CEI 11352 da TUV SUD.  Alens nasce dalla sfida di professionisti indipendenti e dei soci Davide Mariani, Paolo Guardamagna che si sono formati negli anni come esperti di gestione energia attraverso esperienze pluriennali maturate sul campo. Nello staff Alens sono presenti diversi EGE (esperti gestione energia) certificati ai sensi della norma UNI-CEI 11339 da parte terza accreditata e professionisti dell'M&V certificati CMVP (Certified Measurement & Verification Professional).  L'ufficio tecnico vanta più di 10 ingegneri qualificati.

Company description: Energy Dome is an innovative energy storage company specializing in the development of utility-scale carbon dioxide (CO2) battery systems. The company's mission is to provide cost-effective, efficient, and scalable energy storage solutions that enhance the integration of renewable energy sources into the grid. Energy Dome's flagship technology utilizes compressed CO2 to store and discharge energy, boasting a roundtrip efficiency of over 75% and a service life exceeding 30 years without performance degradation. The company has partnered with notable clients such as Alliant Energy, Madison Gas and Electric, and Shell Global Solutions to implement its technology in projects like the Columbia Energy Storage Project in Wisconsin. Targeting utilities and energy providers, Energy Dome aims to revolutionize energy storage and contribute to a sustainable energy future.

The company serves a diverse clientele, including industrial customers and energy suppliers across Europe, and collaborates with various partners to enhance its green energy offerings. VNG H&V's mission is to ensure reliable energy supply while actively contributing to climate protection and sustainability, aligning with its vision of fostering a greener future through innovative energy solutions.

Company description: Energieleverancier Elegant is actief op de Belgische markt sinds april 2012 en levert 100% groene stroom en aardgas in Vlaanderen aan ongeveer 100.000 klanten.  We onderscheiden ons door 3 belangrijke troeven:  1- Eenvoud Bij Elegant houden we alles simpel. Een scherp tarief, passend bij je verbruik. Bij ons geen verhalen over het belang van groene stroom en wat mensen moeten doen om de wereld te redden. Groene stroom is voor ons normaal, geen lifestyle. Ons bedrijf is eenvoudig en efficiënt ingericht, zodat we zo weinig mogelijk kosten hebben. Daarom betaal je ook een lagere prijs voor stroom en gas. 2- Geen gedoe We hebben onze dienstverlening zo efficiënt gemaakt dat je zo weinig mogelijk tijd bij ons verliest. Overstappen. Verhuizen. Alles kan met een paar klikken. We zijn er voor nuchtere mensen: voor iedereen die geen gedoe wil. 3- Vlekkeloze service Elegant krijgt al vanaf de start de hoogste score in de service-vergelijking van de VREG, namelijk 5 sterren. Dit danken we aan onze bijzonder gemotiveerde "persoonlijke dossierbeheerders". Elegant heeft geen anoniem callcenter, maar een zeer gemotiveerd team van persoonlijke dossierbeheerders. Elke klant heeft het rechtstreeks nummer van zijn of haar dossierbeheerder, en kan die altijd bereiken met elke vraag, om een vlotte verhuis te regelen, een nieuwe klant aan te brengen ...

Name: Hidroelectrica
Locations: [Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 15-17 Bd. Ion Mihalache, 011171], [Romania, Bucureşti, Bd. Ion Mihalache]
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 15-17 Bd. Ion Mihalache, 011171
Company description: Hidroelectrica este principalul producător de energie electrică din România, un jucător important în domeniul hidroenergetic în Europa și principalul furnizor de servicii de sistem din România, având un rol important pentru securitatea SEN. Societatea deține și exploatează 182 de centrale hidroelectrice, 5 stații de pompare, un parc eolian cu o putere instalată totală de 108 MW și are o capacitate totală instalată de producere a energiei hidroelectrice de 6,3 GW.   Societatea are șapte sucursale hidroelectrice și o sucursală ce administrează parcul eolian Crucea, Porțile de Fier și Vâlcea fiind cele mai importante din punct de vedere al capacităților acestora de producție a energiei și ponderilor în producția de energie totală a Grupului.   Societatea s-a angajat să producă energie 100% din surse regenerabile și a jucat, încă de la început, un rol esențial în proiectarea și crearea de concepte tehnologice și operaționale care au devenit standardul în sectorul sau de activitate.   Totodată, Hidroelectrica este vânzător angro, precum și furnizor de energie electrică direct către clienții finali, clienți casnici (rezidențiali) și noncasnici (incluzând afaceri din diverse sectoare industriale, cum ar fi construcția de automobile, telecomunicații și construcții etc).   Ca producător de energie din sursă hidro și, mai recent, din sursă eoliană, societatea valorifică sinergiile existente între portofoliul de producție și cel de furnizare, dar și cele generate prin diversificarea portofoliului de producție către alte surse regenerabile, cum ar fi energia eoliană și solară prin mixarea acestora cu sursa hidro.   Începând cu data de 12 iulie 2023, societatea este listată la Bursa de Valori București, la sfârșitul lunii octombrie 2023, Hidroelectrica ocupând locul 1 în top tranzacționare la BVB, cu o valoare de 2,8 miliarde RON.

Company description: Empowering Energy Exploration for a Sustainable Future... Well Guidance is a Directional Drilling Services company based in the Netherlands, and is the culmination of the people and experience from three companies operating internationally from The Netherlands, over the past 30 years. This resulted in Well Guidance becoming the largest independently-owned Dutch Directional Drilling service provider, providing a broad range of advanced well-placement technologies to the global energy markets. Our services include, but are not limited to: •	Directional Drilling •	Measurements While Drilling •	Logging While Drilling tools •	Performance Drilling •	Surveying Services and personnel.  Well Guidance prides itself in bringing innovative and cost-effective solutions to our customers’ projects, which are in the main government entities, rig operators or energy suppliers that are actively involved within the Geothermal and Oil & Gas industries.  Our specialized downhole equipment has performed under a wide range of directional borehole conditions, and our team bring experience not only from the Netherlands but on many projects throughout the EU, and internationally. Our management team have over 100 years of combined drilling experience.  Our field personnel have, on average; •	over 25 years experience in the drilling industry (esp. Oil & Gas), •	of which over 12 years is on average in Geothermal Drilling, •	and over 5 years is in high temperature Geothermal Drilling projects. Company description: Over ons Bij SPOT Energie zijn we gepassioneerd over het leveren van onafhankelijk energieadvies aan de zakelijke markt. Ons team van experts biedt strategisch inkoopadvies dat bedrijven helpt om hun energiekosten te optimaliseren en duurzame keuzes te maken. Met onze diepgaande kennis van de energiemarkt en een klantgerichte aanpak, zorgen we ervoor dat onze klanten altijd de beste deals krijgen. Onze missie Onze missie is om bedrijven te empoweren met de kennis en tools die ze nodig hebben om slimme, duurzame energiekeuzes te maken. We streven ernaar om een betrouwbare partner te zijn die waarde toevoegt door middel van transparant en onafhankelijk advies. Onze visie Wij geloven in een toekomst waarin bedrijven niet alleen financieel profiteren van hun energiekeuzes, maar ook bijdragen aan een duurzamere wereld. Door strategisch advies en innovatieve oplossingen willen we de energiemarkt transformeren en bedrijven helpen hun ecologische voetafdruk te verkleinen. Waarom SPOT Energie? Onafhankelijk Advies: We zijn niet gebonden aan energieleveranciers, wat betekent dat ons advies altijd in het beste belang van onze klanten is. Expertise en ervaring: Ons team bestaat uit ervaren professionals met diepgaande kennis van de energiemarkt. Innovatieve oplossingen: We blijven voortdurend op de hoogte van de nieuwste trends en technologieën om onze klanten de meest effectieve oplossingen te bieden. Klantgericht: We luisteren naar de behoeften van onze klanten en bieden op maat gemaakte oplossingen die echt werken. Onze Locatie We zijn onlangs verhuisd naar een moderne en inspirerende locatie in Breda. Ons nieuwe kantoor biedt een dynamische werkomgeving die samenwerking en innovatie stimuleert. Kom bij ons team We zijn altijd op zoek naar getalenteerde en gemotiveerde professionals die ons team willen versterken. Als je geïnteresseerd bent in een carrière bij SPOT Energie, bekijk dan onze vacatures en ontdek hoe je deel kunt uitmaken van ons groeiende team.

Company description: CiS GmbH – Tailored Drone and Software Solutions for Complex Challenges! CiS GmbH, founded in 1990 in Rostock, is a leading German manufacturer of drone and software solutions for industry, business, and public applications. We offer flexible and modular drones – from mechanical design and advanced control algorithms to intuitive planning software. Through intensive research and development of state-of-the-art drones for hard-to-reach indoor areas and tactical scenarios in the security sector, we are currently the only German company that offers and manufactures solutions of this development depth. Each of our products is developed and produced in our modern facility in Rostock, adhering to the highest safety and efficiency standards. Furthermore, our focus has always been on digital information systems. Our goal is to efficiently capture hard-to-access data and present it in a user-friendly manner. Therefore, we also develop specialized GIS applications for network operators and energy suppliers at our Rostock location. Thanks to our strong background in the GIS field, we can offer fully integrated solutions that meet the current demands of the industry. Our clients operate across a variety of sectors, including the energy industry, public service, industry, and agriculture. Our passion is to collaboratively develop innovative solutions with our partners and advance developments in the field of drone technology and software.

Company description: LIFEPOWR is at the forefront of transforming the energy landscape by orchestrating energy flows to balance the grid while unlocking the flexibility of thousands of decentralized energy assets.  Our technology empowers consumers to lower their energy bills and even earn from the energy market—effortlessly. At the same time, we accelerate the energy transition by directly cutting CO₂ emissions from gas-fired peaker plants. Based in Antwerp and active since 2015, our team of experts develops cutting-edge solutions built on years of experience in energy management and storage. Our flagship platform, FlexiO, is more than just an EMS. Going beyond traditional energy management, FlexiO optimizes energy flows, reduces costs, and monetizes flexibility in one seamless solution. It integrates behind-the-meter energy management with market optimization, unlocking value for households, businesses, and energy providers alike. Originally launched under its own name as a demo-client, FlexiO is now scaling rapidly as a white-label solution, adopted by leading players across the energy sector.

Company description: Miogas & Luce è un brand di Segnoverde S.p.A. Unipersonale. La nostra storia inizia negli anni Sessanta dall’unione di cinque società municipalizzate operanti nella fornitura di gas naturale ed energia elettrica. Nel tempo cresciamo e diventiamo il principale fornitore di gas, luce e sistemi di efficientamento energetico dell’area Sud di Milano. La presenza sul territorio e la vicinanza alle persone che lo abitano sono da sempre i nostri punti di forza; per questo la nostra rete di sportelli è cresciuta e oggi ci trovi nei comuni di Rozzano, Melegnano, Binasco, Gaggiano, San Giuliano Milanese, Pieve Emanuele e Zibido San Giacomo. La cortesia, la gentilezza e la competenza dei nostri dipendenti, degli operatori di sportello e dei consulenti della rete commerciale sono i nostri tratti distintivi e il motivo per cui rappresentiamo un punto di riferimento per tante famiglie, imprese e condomini che hanno scelto di rivolgersi a noi. Attenzione al Cliente e ascolto dei suoi bisogni, personalizzazione del servizio offerto, attaccamento al territorio, costruzione di sinergie e partnership con le realtà locali: sono i punti fermi che ci guidano e che ci spingono a tenere alta la fiducia di chi sceglie Miogas & Luce come partner per l’energia.

Company description: Commerciale Gas & Luce è un brand di Segnoverde S.p.A. Unipersonale. La nostra storia inizia negli anni Sessanta a Gallarate, da una costola di AMSC S.p.A. – Azienda Multiservizi Comunali attiva dal 1907, con la metanizzazione del comune di Gallarate. Nel tempo cresciamo e diventiamo il principale fornitore di gas, energia elettrica e sistemi di efficientamento energetico del varesotto. La presenza sul territorio e la vicinanza alle persone che lo abitano sono da sempre i nostri punti di forza; per questo da più di 60 anni ci impegniamo a fornire il miglior servizio possibile e oggi mettiamo a disposizione dei nostri Clienti due sportelli fisici: la storica sede di Gallarate e quella più recente di Busto Arsizio. Company description: Die Clevergy GmbH & Co. KG ist ein deutscher Stromanbieter und ein Tochterunternehmen der Kommunalversorger Stadtwerke Nürnberg und Hannover mit Sitz in Leipzig. Diese sind Teil der Thüga-Gruppe, Deutschlands größtem Zusammenschluss regionaler Energieversorger. Clevergy wurde zu Beginn des Jahres 2008 gegründet und begann am 1. Mai 2008 mit der Stromlieferung in folgenden 13 deutschen Städten: Trier, Saarbrücken, Mainz, Pforzheim, Leipzig, Mannheim, Bremen, Bremerhaven, Solingen, Koblenz, Cottbus, Stuttgart und Hamburg. Seit Januar 2009 ist die deutschlandweite Belieferung vollzogen.  Ab 2010 soll Gas vertrieben werden. Blog: www.meta-strom.de

Company description: Techem, su aliado en materia de ahorro energético En calidad de uno de los proveedores líder de servicios energéticos a nivel internacional, Techem está en primera línea para la gestión del ahorro de energía y agua. Nuestra labor es aliviar a los propietarios de viviendas, comunidades de vecinos y a los administradores de fincas de los elevados gastos que supone el consumo de calefacción y agua. De esta forma se ahorra energía y se salvaguardan los recursos, cosa que, a largo plazo, repercute positivamente en todos nosotros y en el medio ambiente. Nuestros productos y soluciones evitan alrededor de 8.5 millones de toneladas de CO2 cada año. Gracias a dispositivos de medición de fabricación propia, como repartidores de costes de calefacción y contadores de agua y energía, calculamos el consumo real de la calefacción, agua o frío por vivienda. Estos datos se utilizan para asignar individualmente las facturas de energía de las viviendas. A través de esta distribución, contribuimos a reducir los costes operativos de nuestros clientes. Diseñamos servicios inteligentes y prácticos: los administradores de fincas pueden asignar y facturar los gastos de forma rápida y eficiente. Nuestro objetivo es reducir sus cargas de trabajo, simplificar sus intervenciones y ahorrarles tiempo a la vez que los propietarios pagan solo por su consumo real. La compañía fue fundada en 1952, ahora está activa en 20 países con alrededor de 3.500 empleados y presta servicios en más de  11.5  millones de viviendas. Techem está representada en todo el mundo por unas 130 sucursales. Puede encontrar más información sobre nuestros servicios y la compañía en https://www.techem.es/

Company description: ESOLEO jest częścią Grupy Polsat Plus. Czerpiemy z 25 lat doświadczenia GPP, realizując własną wizję zrównoważonego biznesu opartego o najnowocześniejsze technologie i wiedzę ekspertów, pasjonatów energii odnawialnej. Oferujemy kompleksowe rozwiązania fotowoltaiczne dla domu i biznesu. W ofercie posiadamy także magazyny energii i pompy ciepła. Bierzemy udział w zielonej transformacji największego, polskiego prywatnego dostawcy energii elektrycznej ZE PAK (pod względem zainstalowanej mocy wytwórczej i ilości wyprodukowanej energii elektrycznej), budując największe w Polsce farmy fotowoltaiczne. W październiku 2021 r. konsorcjum ESOLEO i PAK Serwis ukończyło budowę jednej z największych w Polsce farmy fotowoltaicznej o mocy 70 MW. Farma powstała na 110 ha rekultywowanych terenów kopalni węgla brunatnego Adamów, a do jej budowy spółka zaangażowała m.in. byłych górników, którzy zostali przekwalifikowani i realizują kolejne projekty związane z energią odnawialną. Prąd, który popłynął do odbiorców będzie w stanie zasilić energią elektryczną miasto o wielkości ok. 70 tys. mieszkańców.

Company description: Atriensis is a leading partner in the sustainability of social housing stock in the Netherlands, dedicated to creating affordable, sustainable, healthy, and safe homes for residents. The company offers a comprehensive range of services, including process facilitation, technical support, resident participation, and communication, with a strong emphasis on the energy transition and making neighborhoods gas-free. Atriensis collaborates closely with housing corporations, municipalities, and other stakeholders to develop integrated solutions that meet the current and future needs of tenants. With a team of experts, including senior advisors and directors with extensive experience in the social rental sector, Atriensis aims to share knowledge and implement innovative strategies that accelerate the energy transition.  The firm is headquartered in Amstelveen, with additional offices in Eindhoven and Zwolle, focusing on building support and collaboration among all parties involved to successfully achieve sustainability goals. Atriensis is committed to assisting housing corporations in navigating the complexities of the National Performance Agreements (NPA) for 2025-2035, addressing financial constraints and operational challenges. By fostering local partnerships with energy providers and other stakeholders, Atriensis enhances the effectiveness of sustainability initiatives. The company's mission is to ensure affordable and comfortable housing for all, while its vision encompasses a more sustainable future for the social housing sector. Through its innovative approach and extensive expertise, Atriensis is dedicated to driving the transition towards a greener and more sustainable housing landscape.

Company description: About PRIMAGAS Off-grid energy supply with conventional and biogenic liquid gas. PRIMAGAS offers private and commercial customers off-grid energy solutions throughout Germany. For more than 75 years the company, headquartered in Krefeld, has been a reliable and service-oriented partner for all those who rely on environmentally friendly energy. The TÜV NORD certified PRIMAGAS with the seal "Tested service and installation quality" as the first liquid gas supplier in Germany high quality in three areas: service, customer satisfaction and installation standards. Around 250 employees in the office and in the field as well as well over 3.000 sales partners for technical customer service provide advice on all questions relating to off-grid gas supply. In addition to liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and liquefied natural gas (LNG), PRIMAGAS is the only German energy supplier to offer its customers biogenic LPG (Futuria propane). Liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) Liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) provides the benefits of gas supply wherever there is no connection to the natural gas grid. It is stored in above-ground or buried tanks directly on site. LPG emits around 15 percent less CO2 than heating oil. Hardly any soot or particulate matter is released during combustion. The energy source evaporates without residue and can even be used in nature and water conservation areas without any restrictions. Liquid gas can be used with all modern heating technologies such as gas condensing boiler technology or combined heat and power units (CHP) and can be combined with renewable energies. Biogenic liquefied petroleum gas: Futuria Propane Since 2018, PRIMAGAS has been the first German supplier to market the renewable energy carrier biogenic liquefied petroleum gas (Futuria Propane). Since November 1, 2020, the GEG recognizes biogenic LPG as a sustainable energy alternative for new buildings.C More information at www.primagas.de and www.futuria-propan.de .

Company description: Thüga Aktiengesellschaft is a leading entity in the German energy and water supply sector, operating as a minority shareholder in a network of approximately 100 municipal utilities and regional suppliers. Headquartered in Munich, the company is dedicated to enhancing the future of municipal energy and water supply through collaborative partnerships, with a strong focus on sustainability and the energy transition. Thüga's mission is to support its partners in achieving competitive advantages by providing extensive consulting and services, particularly in the areas of decarbonization, digitalization, and the development of innovative energy solutions.  With a workforce of around 240 employees, Thüga plays a crucial role in facilitating knowledge exchange and project development within its cooperative network, primarily serving local municipalities and their residents. The company is committed to driving the energy transition forward, particularly through initiatives like hydrogen projects and municipal heat planning, thereby contributing to climate neutrality and sustainable energy practices. Thüga aims to enhance its market position by actively seizing opportunities while managing associated risks, ensuring sustainable growth and profitability. The clientele of Thüga includes various municipal utilities and energy providers across Germany, with a focus on fostering regional cooperation and innovation in energy supply and management. The company collaborates with a diverse range of stakeholders to improve energy efficiency and support the transition to renewable energy sources, aligning with broader environmental goals. Through strategic investments and partnerships, Thüga seeks to strengthen its portfolio and contribute to the stability and security of energy supply in the regions it serves. Overall, Thüga Aktiengesellschaft is committed to providing reliable and sustainable energy solutions while ensuring compliance with the highest technical and security standards, leading the transition towards a more sustainable energy future.

Company description: L'Azienda Gopower, società toscana accreditata presso il MSE, opera nel settore energetico nazionale come fornitore di gas naturale ed energia elettrica, coprendo tutte le fasi della filiera, dall'approvvigionamento all'erogazione ai clienti finali. Le forniture energetiche sono integrate da una vasta gamma di prestazioni e di servizi accessori, passando dalla consulenza alla formazione, dall'assistenza tecnica alla fornitura di prodotti tecnologici, coprendo sia gli ambiti ambientali, sia quelli dell'efficientamento energetico (incluse le diagnosi energetiche e la fornitura di prodotti Led). Partner diretta di Confesercenti nel nuovo servizio "Sportello Energia" dedicato a tutti gli associati, Gopower è riconosciuta come interlocutore ideale per un'ampia varietà di attori, tra cui: Aziende private; Associazioni di Categoria; Privati cittadini. Mission e Vision La mission di Gopower è favorire la diffusione della cultura energetica e delle idee innovative attraverso prodotti, attività e servizi che soddisfino i bisogni del più ampio pubblico possibile.  Nella propria vision, Gopower introduce una proposta di eticità nel mercato energetico, quale marchio imprescindibile del proprio modo di operare, per far convivere l'innovazione, la tutela dell'ambiente e la qualità dei servizi e prodotti erogati. Per informazioni: Telefono 0586 41 06 41  e-mail info@gopower.it

Company description: Ulefos AB, tidigare VATEK, VA Teknik AB är ett försäljningsbolag som marknadsför produkter för kommunala vattendistributionsnät samt vatten- och avloppsreningsverk. Vi har varit verksamma sedan 1981. Vi utvecklar och arbetar med funktionella  produkter av hög kvalitet för VA-, VVS- och  Gasmarknaden. Produktprogrammet består av gatugods, ventiler, rörkopplingar, brand- och spolposter, reparationsmuffar, elektrosvetsning,PE-rördelar, avvattningsrännor och rörproppar. Vi har sedan 2007 har vi sålt gatugods från gjuterierna Ulefos Jernverk och Niemisen Valimo, och sedan 2010 är vi en del av Cappelen Group. Cappelen Group består idag av säljbolagen Ulefos som finns representerade i Sverige, Norge, Danmark och Finland, samt gjuterierna Ulefos Jernverk och Niemisen Valimo. Vi är bland de ledande och mest etablerade leverantörerna i Sverige och vi samarbetar med välkända tillverkare i Europa. Tillsammans har vi lång erfarenhet och kunskap om marknaden och våra kunder är till största delen kommuner, energileverantörer samt entreprenadföretag över hela Sverige. Vi distribuerar våra produkter genom de ledande rörgrossisterna som även lagerhåller produkterna för att hålla en hög tillgänglighet och servicegrad ända ut till slutkunden. Huvudkontoret för Ulefos AB ligger i Stenkullen, 2 mil öster om Göteborg samt lokala säljkontor i Karlskoga, Bålsta och Kristianstad.

Company description: Impeak GmbH is a leading company in direct sales, with over 15 years of successful experience in the energy and telecommunications sectors. The company specializes in providing personalized consulting and individual support to both private and business clients, particularly in energy supply and fiber optic expansion. Impeak's mission is to deliver an optimal shopping experience by assisting customers in finding the best products and tariffs, while simultaneously focusing on a sustainable and long-term growth strategy. The target market includes end consumers as well as businesses, and the company's partnerships with renowned energy suppliers and telecommunications providers enhance its market position.  Impeak is dedicated to the development of its employees, offering numerous career opportunities, including pathways for career changers, to build a dynamic and successful sales team. Employees benefit from a structured career path that allows them to progress from sales roles to leadership positions, supported by a dedicated training portal tailored to the needs of direct sales.  Impeak values fair compensation, combining a reliable base salary with performance-based incentives, empowering employees to set their own goals and achieve desired earnings. The company is committed to maintaining a trustworthy reputation in the direct sales industry, collaborating with well-known brands to offer high-quality products and a robust sales infrastructure. Through team-building events and recognition programs, Impeak celebrates collective successes and fosters a supportive work environment, ensuring that both employees and clients thrive.

Name: EP NL
Company description: EP NL is a reliable and ambitious player that takes a leading role in shaping the future of the energy landscape in the Netherlands. With this as our foundation, EP NL consists of three pillars: ‘flexible generation’, ‘trading and asset optimization’ and ‘energy solutions for business’.  We play a significant role in the Dutch energy transition by providing reliable electricity supply through our current gas-fired power plants. They provide efficient and adaptable solutions to meet the increasing demand for flexible and renewable energy in the electricity supply. Due to global movements in commodity prices and the energy transition, energy markets are highly dynamic and volatile. We continuously respond to this situation. We hedge and optimize our portfolio on commodity markets and provide various tailor made products to the electricity grid. We trade in: electricity, natural gas and carbon emissions. In addition to our important role in electricity production and trading, we are expanding our influence as an established energy supplier.  We focus on supplying electricity and gas to small and large businesses, offering standard and customized contracts. EP NL is part of the EPH-group, a leading European energy-company, acting in 9 countries and part of EP Power Europe.  For more info go to our website at epnl.nl

Company description: Stadtwerke Neuwied GmbH is an energy supplier settled in the Rhineland. In everything we do, we believe that we can secure the quality of life in our city and the region, help shape it and improve it every day with our work. A secure supply of energy, ecologically responsible action, caring service and social commitment are not just a duty, but a matter of the heart. Stadtwerke Neuwied are 100 percent owned by the city of Neuwied. That obliges. We act entrepreneurially so that energy as a product remains affordable. We act responsibly by supporting associations, voluntary work and all those who are committed to the best of our ability.  Ecology and economy are inextricably linked. We are actively shaping the energy and transport transition in Neuwied as our contribution to environmental and climate protection. We create solutions for the efficient and resource-saving use of energy. We create new, environmentally friendly mobility offers in the city. We connect people by expanding the fiber optic network. By taking the lead and investing our profits in the infrastructure, we strengthen Neuwied as an attractive and sustainable place to live and do business on the Middle Rhine.

Company description: (Vi søker flere nye kollegaer) Vi er et teknologiselskap med hovedkontor i Vestlandets hovedstad, Bergen. Vi lanserte Metzum i januar 2020 som en felles teknologisatsing mellom Fjordkraft AS og Rieber & Søn AS. Ideen sprang ut fra et ønske om å utvikle løsninger for effektivisering av forretningsprosesser for aktører i kraftmarkedet. Metzum leverer fremtidsrettet programvare til strømleverandører, nettselskapet og andre kundegrupper med behov for effektive løsninger for avregning og fakturering. Våre løsninger er modulære og bygget på moderne prinsipper; tilrettelagt for effektiv drift i skyen. Dette gir løsninger som skalerer og effektiviserer driften for våre kunder.

Company description: Our parent company, EXTOR Electronics Kft. was founded in 2000, is a 100% Hungarian-owned company, which deals with power supply tasks, mainly with the sale, service and project implementation of uninterruptible power supply equipment and systems. Using its unique experience in power supply, EXTOR Kft. has extended its activities to the utilization of solar energy, the complete design and construction of solar power plants, the supply, installation and operation of related equipment.  Our major references include the full construction of a 2×46.6 MW solar power plant on MVM Émász, the full construction of a 41.92 MW solar power plant on OPUS Titász, and the full construction of a 5 MW and a 15 MW solar power plant on E.ON electricity supplier area. We have also completed the construction of a 46.7 MW solar power plant on OPUS Titász area, including the connection to the 132/22 kV public grid. In the projects listed, our tasks included permitting, designing, selecting suppliers, technical supervision of the project, on-site coordination of construction. In addition, the commissioning of the completed solar power plants and substations and their handover to continuous operation.   Our company, EXTOR Energy Zrt., started its operations in 2022 to take forward the renewable energy tasks and operational expertise as a wholly owned subsidiary of EXTOR Kft., with the full support of our parent company.

Company description: The EEBus Initiative e.V. is developing a communication standard for energy-relevant devices and systems with its member companies and associations. The standard covers the entire chain from the grid operator and energy supplier to the end device (such as heat pumps, charging stations, battery storage systems, PV inverters and white goods). As a registered, non-profit organisation, the Initiative ensures that the results from its working groups and the scientific and research findings are transferred to the EEBUS specification and subsequently to the national (DKE, FNN) and international (CEN, Cenelec, ETSI, IEC and ISO) committees.

Company description: Welcome to Albert Maier GmbH! For more than 60 years we have been a leading manufacturer of transformer accessories for oil-immersed transformers. With our long year experience and through consistent development of our products we are a reliable partner for transformer manufacturer and energy suppliers worldwide With our long year experience and through consistent development of our products we are a reliable partner for transformer manufacturer and energy suppliers worldwide. What’s the formula for success that made us become a reliable and long-term business partner for many leading transformer manufacturing companies of today from the time when we established business in 1949? It’s our partners trust in our expertise and in the continuous performance of our network. We have been establishing subsidiaries and partner companies in order to deliver best service and to be able to live up to the rising standards of high quality transformer components. This close cooperation with our partners allows us to meet our own demands in terms of quality and costs of pre-products and finished components within our supply chain. Nowadays we manufacture with more than 100 employees in Germany and Turkey butterfly valves and dehydrating breathers for power transformers as well as oil level indicators, moisture holders, pressure relief devices, and tank components for oil-immersed distribution transformers.

Company description: Non siamo un fornitore di energia e gas. Siamo consulenti specializzati che ti aiutano a ottimizzare i costi, navigare il mercato e adottare soluzioni sostenibili. Affianchiamo reseller, PMI e grandi aziende con strategie su misura per un’energia efficiente e vantaggiosa. Sei un reseller? Ti supportiamo in ogni fase operativa, dalla costituzione della società agli adempimenti normativi, fino alla fatturazione in outsourcing e all’assistenza legale. Ti aiutiamo a costruire un business solido, con gli strumenti giusti per crescere. Sei una PMI? Grazie ai gruppi d’acquisto, accedi a condizioni riservate alle grandi aziende. Hai sempre un referente dedicato per la gestione della tua utenza, la risoluzione dei problemi e l’ottimizzazione dei costi energetici, senza vincoli e con piena trasparenza. Sei una grande azienda? Ti aiutiamo a pianificare gli acquisti, negoziare forniture su misura, ottimizzare la gestione dell’energia e dell'efficenza energetica. I nostri tecnici EGE certificati ti guidano nell’adozione di strategie ESG e nella riduzione dell’impatto ambientale. Offriamo: ✔ Analisi di mercato per prevedere le fluttuazioni e ottimizzare i costi ✔ Accesso a incentivi per energivori, energy release e interrompibilità gas ✔ Strategie di efficientamento energetico e gestione di TEE e PPA on-site ✔ Supporto nella certificazione ISO 50001 e nella realizzazione di impianti EsCo Perché scegliere ALI Energy Advisor? 🔹 Strategie personalizzate per ogni tipo di impresa 🔹 Condizioni vantaggiose e monitoraggio costante del mercato 🔹 Sostenibilità ed ESG, con esperti certificati per migliorare il tuo impatto ambientale 🔹 Un team di specialisti sempre al tuo fianco, senza vincoli contrattuali Con ALI Energy Advisor, trasformi l’energia in un vantaggio strategico.

Our portals UWZ-Unwetterzentrale, wetter.tv and the Morecast app complete our portfolio. We are hiring. Company description: Greenchoice is een energieleverancier die zich richt op het MKB en biedt oplossingen voor zowel klein- als grootzakelijke klanten. Het bedrijf stelt zijn klanten in staat om hun energiezaken eenvoudig te beheren via het online platform "Mijn Greenchoice Zakelijk", waar zij hun verbruik, termijnbedragen en facturen kunnen inzien en aanpassen. Greenchoice streeft ernaar een betrouwbare partner te zijn voor slimme energiekeuzes, met een focus op transparantie en klantgerichtheid. De missie van het bedrijf is om ondernemers te ondersteunen in hun energiebehoeften, terwijl ze ook rekening houden met de opbouw van energietarieven en overheidsheffingen. Hun klantenbestand omvat een breed scala aan bedrijven, van kleine ondernemingen tot grote zakelijke klanten, die allemaal profiteren van de flexibele en toegankelijke diensten die Greenchoice biedt.

Company description: Vacuum Barrier Systems offers a unique range of vacuum jacketed lines and cryogenic transfer systems. From short flexible hoses to large plant distribution systems, from “do it yourself” mail order sales to complete turnkey systems, Vacuum Barrier Systems will provide the most cost effective solution. With over 30 years of experience serving various industries, strong links with installation companies and gas suppliers in different countries and technical support from world leaders in their fields, we can handle both small and large projects. In addition to transfer lines, we also specialize in specific cryogenic process equipment such as LN2 dosing systems for the food and beverage industry, LN2 circulation systems for MBE (Molecular Beam Epitaxy), spraying systems for halogen lights manufacturing... Our activities cover all European countries, the Middle East, Africa, Russia and India. In many geographical areas, our presence is supported locally by trained professionals.

Company description: Lumenaza GmbH is a Berlin-based company that develops solutions driving the digitalization of the energy transition, enabling both individuals and businesses to benefit from the generation and use of green energy.  Through its SaaS platform, Lumenaza has been transforming companies into aggregators of electricity and electricity suppliers since 2013.  Within its end-to-end solutions for aggregation of electricity and electricity tariffs under a white-label model, Lumenaza takes on areas such as billing, balancing group management, business process outsourcing (BPO), CRM, flexibility, customer communication, customer portals, market communication (MaKo), product catalog, redispatch, electricity trading, and virtual power plants.  Lumenaza’s SaaS platform serves customers including energy suppliers/municipal utilities, aggregators of electricity/electricity traders, and new market players/OEMs, such as Octopus Energy, EnBW, E.ON, Hycube, SonneNext, and Regionah Energie.  Under the LUOX Energy brand, Lumenaza GmbH offers end customers a green, dynamic electricity tariff that allows them to purchase electricity at exchange prices and, through biogas, wind, or solar installations, to feed their green electricity into the market at exchange prices via aggregation of electricity.

Company description: Electra Italia is a young, dynamic company and part of a leading Swiss energy group. This enables us to access and exploit not only group experience but also cutting-edge technological and organizational resources. Set up in 2000 following the deregulation of the electricity supply market in Italy, Electra Italia immediately began to make its mark as an energy provider for industry thanks to its key attributes: - effective energy procurement, - bespoke product development, - extensive market presence, - efficient customer services, - clear, transparent billing.    The companies that have chosen Electra Italia as their energy requirement provider bear witness to our market standing: a partnership characterised by purpose-specific solutions and prompt responses to every kind of customer request. With its customers, Electra Italia forges a proactive relationship to ensure the most efficient management of their energy needs.  Choosing Electra Italia means choosing: - innovative products, - flexible supply contracts with various purchasing options, - direct access to markets,  -active portfolio management with fewer risks and greater opportunities.

Company description: OCTA+ est un fournisseur d'énergie belge indépendant, spécialisé dans la fourniture d'électricité, de gaz naturel, de mazout de chauffage et de solutions de recharge pour flottes professionnelles. Avec plus de 130 ans d'expertise, la société se positionne comme un partenaire de confiance pour les grandes entreprises, offrant des solutions énergétiques sur mesure qui visent à optimiser les coûts et à soutenir la transition énergétique. La mission d'OCTA+ est de simplifier la gestion énergétique de ses clients tout en garantissant des tarifs compétitifs et un service client réactif, avec un interlocuteur dédié pour chaque entreprise. En s'engageant à fournir des solutions durables et innovantes, OCTA+ s'adresse à un large éventail de clients, allant des particuliers aux PME et grandes entreprises, tout en collaborant avec des partenaires pour renforcer son offre de services.

Company description: Bij Lux Consulting zijn we gepassioneerd over het versnellen van de energietransitie. Daarom ondersteunen we organisaties die actief werken aan een duurzame toekomst. Onze focus ligt op netbeheerders, energieleveranciers, waterpartijen, gemeenten, waterschappen en andere instellingen die deze uitdaging aangaan.  We hebben een breed scala aan professionele Business Consultants met specialismen als projectmanagement, change management, procesoptimalisatie, management consulting, IT en nog veel meer. Lux Consulting biedt dagelijkse kennis en deskundige ondersteuning om jouw energieambities te verwezenlijken én om alles voor jouw organisatie zo in te richten om dat haalbaar te maken. Onze consultants zijn uw partners in verandering, met een diepgaand begrip van de uitdagingen en mogelijkheden die de energietransitie met zich meebrengt. Door middel van kennis, kunde en praktische oplossingen helpen we u bij het realiseren van uw duurzame doelen en het creëren van een betere wereld voor de toekomstige generaties. 💡🌍   Wij onderscheiden ons door een hands-on approach, onze consultants denken én werken vanaf het eerste moment  met u mee.  Ontdek hoe Lux Consulting u kan begeleiden op uw weg naar een groenere en veerkrachtigere toekomst. Bezoek onze website https://luxconsulting.nl/ voor meer informatie en neem vandaag nog contact met ons op voor een inspirerend gesprek over uw projecten. Samen kunnen we de kracht van verandering ontketenen! 🚀  Ons doel is organisaties bekrachtigen voor een duurzame toekomst 🌱🔌   #EnergieTransitie #SustainableSolutions #PartnersInChange #GreatPlaceToWork

Company description: Our goal - green electricity for everyone We at supply network service have been working since 2018 to ensure that the energy transition succeeds. Our team, which currently consists of 12 colleagues, sees itself as a link between the transmission system operators and land owners. As a service provider, we would like to use experience, expertise and the right strategy to help ensure that the dialogue between the transmission system operator and the owner of the space is successful. Making the projects successful ensures that everyone can use electricity from renewable energies and that the grid expansion is successful. We are only satisfied when all parties are satisfied. Our portfolio If a transmission network operator or energy supplier would like to use a certain area for his project, we determine the owner and check the legal situation of the area. In order to secure the areas, we are looking to talk to the owners. We clarify land registry matters and provide answers to any questions that may arise. Because trust can only be created with openness and reliability. Even if it gets difficult, we are there for you as an intermediary to find a solution. Our objection management is trained to consider all arguments and still come to a result that satisfies all parties. Your data and contracts are in safe hands with us. Seriousness and discretion come first. The right acquisition of the land is our goal in order to realize the network expansion.

Company description: Uw totaalenergieadviseur Bonergie helpt particulieren en ondernemers met het verlagen van energiekosten. Met creatieve oplossingen voor elke energie-uitdaging zoekt Bonergie samen met haar netwerk van sparringpartners naar het maximaliseren van energie-efficiëntie. De Aanpak Sinds 2011 ondersteunen wij klanten als energie-intermediair, Eind 2012 werd Bonergie (samenvoeging Bonestroo Energie) opgericht. Na enkele uitdagingen waaronder een faillissement van een energieleverancier, hebben we in 2014 een groei ingezet door onze inzet en doorzettingsvermogen. Persoonlijke benadering en aandacht voor de unieke behoeften van de klanten maken Bonergie bijzonder. Afhankelijk van uw vraag nemen we een coördinerende, regisserende of ondersteunende rol aan, waarbij het belang van de klant altijd voorop staat. Missie en Diensten Onze missie is om klanten te helpen hun energiekosten te verlagen door: 1.	Onafhankelijk en gratis advies voor lagere energietarieven. 2.	Verminderen van energieverbruik. 3.	Maximaliseren van eigen energieopwekking met een hoog rendement. Bonergie biedt energiemaatwerkadviezen en beschikt over expertise als EPA-W adviseur. Met opleidingen in Nederland en Duitsland op het gebied van zonnepanelen en batterijopslag maakt Bonergie een unieke partner voor energieoplossingen. Recente Ontwikkelingen Na de sluiting van de Energiewinkel in 2019 ligt de focus op kostenbesparing. In 2023 ontstond een sterke vraag naar zonnepanelen, maar ontstonden ook personeelstekort en  leveringsproblemen. Door ontwikkelingen in 2024 rondom saldering is de vraag naar batterijen en energiecontracten zonder terugleverkosten gestegen. Bonergie, als Register Solar-Specialist en Storage-Specialist, helpt bij de keuze voor de juiste batterij, zonnepanelen en energiecontract. Bij Bonergie staat kwaliteit voorop. Problemen zien wij als uitdagingen. Ontdek de kracht van Bonergie en maak uw energiegebruik efficiënter en duurzamer! Neem contact met ons op voor uw duurzame toekomst!

Company description: Volgens easyEnergy kan de Nederlandse energiemarkt een stuk eerlijker en transparanter. De meeste energieleveranciers rekenen een stevige winstopslag bovenop de prijs die zijzelf betalen. Met dat geld, jouw geld dus eigenlijk, financieren ze hun personeel, dure panden en niet te vergeten, de voetbal sponsordeals. Daarnaast werken veel energieleveranciers met lokkertjes: welkomstbonussen en kortingen die je moeten overhalen om te switchen. Al die kosten moeten natuurlijk wel terugverdiend worden, en jij mag raden wie de rekening daarvoor betaalt. Bij easyEnergy vinden we dat onrechtvaardig en doen we het anders. Revolutionair anders. Net als alle andere energieleveranciers koopt easyEnergy haar energie in op de Europese Gas- en Elektriciteitsmarkt. Het grote verschil is echter dat easyEnergy deze beursprijs één-op-één doorgeeft aan al haar klanten, zonder verborgen kosten, nu én in de toekomst. We rekenen een minieme opslag, en we brengen, net zoals elke energieleverancier, vaste leveringskosten in rekening. Bij ons is dat per maand maar 5,00 euro voor groene stroom en 5,00 euro voor gas. Hier doen wij alles voor. Of je nu een nieuwe klant bent of al een tijdje bij ons bent, dat maakt voor ons niet uit. Hierdoor levert easyEnergy blijvend voordelige energie in Nederland.

Company description: The leading company in the evaporative cooling industry — Evapolar was founded in 2015. What first began as a new step towards private cooling solutions, has turned into the top-rank provider of personal air treatment solutions and B2B cooling systems.  Our unprecedented Innovative evaBREEZE® technology is what makes our products unique. We engineered mineral nano-membrane fibers which provide an efficient evaporative cooling effect. By harnessing the power of water, we turn it into a perfect cooling temperature.  No scary energy bills, no waste, no freon liquids, no bulky items. We offer very user-friendly smart air-cooling gadgets that humidify, purify and cool down at the same time.  Stylish, minimalist, and any-design-friendly, Evapolar air treatment devices perfectly fit within any décor, from your white Scandinavian living room to a hygge camping van.  With warehouses in Australia, Hong-Kong, Germany, and the United States, we offer worldwide shipping and premium customer support.  Today Evapolar devices are cooling the living spaces of people in 92 countries. Our team members are in different corners of the world. We have mastered the art of Zoom, learned each other’s time zones, and found a common language in work chats. What we share is a great desire to make the world a better (and a more chill) place.  Exceptional team, dream product, one-of-a-kind technology, an eco-friendly approach, and making the world cooler, one Evapolar at a time.

Company description: AMT Gastroguss is a producer of high-quality cookware and gastronorms, currently known in over 100 countries.  As one of the few companies on the market, we design and manufacture all the in our own factory. Over 100 years of tradition, cooperation with proffesional chefs from around the world and knowledge of the catering industry allow us to offer solutions that meet the needs of all culinary artists: both professional chefs and cooking enthusiasts. *Proffesional’s choice* AMT cookware is created in cooperation with chefs from around the world. They are the first to test it.  By choosing AMT, you gain access to proven, high-quality products recommended by professionals. *Healthy cooking without oil* Our cookware are designed in a way to facilitate the preparation of balanced meals with high nutritional value. Thanks to the non-stick Lotan coating you can fry without any fat or oil! *Energy efficient cookware – Save time, energy and money* AMT cookware is made of special hand-casted aluminum, which is an excellent thermal conductor. A thick base (8-9 mm) ensures even heat distribution, both on the bottom and the sides. Thanks to that it heats up faster and maintains temperature even after the heat is switched off. Results? Food preparation takes up to 40% less time and saves up to 20% energy, which means lower energy bills for you! *Prestigious awards* Over the years, AMT has won numerous awards and got certificates that confirm the highest quality of our products. We are the only cookware manufacturer recommended by the World Association of Chefs Societies (WACS) and Verband Der Köche Deutschland (VKD), the largest German association of chefs. It’s they, who gave us the title: „The World's Best Pan”. We’ve been awarded the A-Class Safety and Energy Efficiency Certificate from TÜV Rheinland, won in the "Best Value for Money" category of Focus Money, gained the „excellent” result in ETM Testmagazin... and many more.

The JV develops, operates, and maintains green hydrogen projects, serving the growing demand in the Iberian Peninsula.  The goal is to reach a 20% market share of the green hydrogen business in Spain and Portugal by 2030, which entails an initially planned investment of over €2 billion. Company description: Green Energy Lab, a research initiative for sustainable energy solutions, is part of the Austrian innovation campaign “Vorzeigeregion Energie” (“Showcase Region Energy”) of the Climate and Energy Fund. Green Energy Lab is Austria’s largest innovation laboratory for green energy. It comprises the test markets Vienna, Lower Austria, Burgenland, and Styria—all in all about five million end customers. More than 100 partners from research, industry, and the public sector join the energy suppliers of these four Austrian provinces, namely “Wien Energie” in Vienna, “EVN” in Lower Austria, “Energie Burgenland” in Burgenland, and “Energie Steiermark” in Styria, in order to develop customer- and demand-oriented, scalable solutions all the way from prototypes to marketability. Thanks to Green Energy Lab’s direct access to the core market of energy suppliers, new developments can immediately be tested on a large scale. By 2025, Green Energy Lab will have invested 100 million euros in innovative projects.

Company description: Bij Equal Energy geloven we niet alleen in een groene en duurzame wereld. Als jong en gedreven intermediair tussen energieleverancier en klant herkennen we ook de waarde van het collectief. Want samen bereik je simpelweg méér dan alleen. Het is een filosofie die de basis vormt van alles wat we doen. Transparant, betrokken en met een flinke portie lef. Maar ook uiterst laagdrempelig en scherp gefocust op de toekomst. Kortom, nét even anders! Equal Energy bedient haar klanten op maat met groene stroom en gas. Duurzame en kwalitatief hoogwaardige producten die het comfort binnen de woon- en werkomgeving vergroten. En ervoor zorgen dat je zonder omkijken dóór kunt. Altijd en overal. We leveren energie aan individuele afnemers. Particulier én zakelijk. Maar liever nog trekken we de kaders breder. En gaan we een hechte en langdurige samenwerking aan met klantencollectieven, zoals verenigingen, bedrijven, sportclubs en vriendengroepen. Want door groene energie gezamenlijk in te kopen, is de winst het hoogst. Voor het milieu én de portemonnee van onze klanten… Toekomstgericht investeren in het milieu heeft bij Equal Energy de hoogste prioriteit. Daar handelen we dan ook naar. Primair via de verkoop van groene stroom en gas. Maar ook door een stevige korting te geven op een breed scala van duurzame producten, zoals zonnepanelen, spouwmuurisolatie en laadpalen. Last but not least gaat 10 procent van onze winst naar duurzame initiatieven. Zo dragen we structureel bij aan het behoud van het regenwoud in het Amazone-gebied. Do you care about the future? Go Equal! Met Equal Energy ga je ook op energiegebied op weg naar een duurzamere toekomst. Heb jij de guts om als ambassadeur samen met ons de wereld een beetje beter te maken? Kom dan in actie en meld je vereniging, bedrijf, sportclub of vriendengroep vandaag nog aan!

CarPay-Diem integrates into and enriches any existing mobile application from either fuel retailers or any other mobile app or connected vehicle willing to upgrade their offering with a pay@pump function combined with an innovative direct marketing approach. CarPay-Diem is a neutral platform, that can act as the single point of access (mobile payment hub) to sites from multiple retailer brands. Company description: RenewHydro is a pioneering company dedicated to advancing sustainable energy solutions through innovative hydroelectric technologies. With a mission to harness the power of water to create clean, renewable energy, RenewHydro aims to contribute to a greener future while promoting environmental stewardship. The company collaborates with a diverse range of clients, including government agencies, private sector companies, and environmental organizations, to implement hydroelectric projects that meet the growing demand for sustainable energy. RenewHydro's vision is to lead the transition to renewable energy sources, ensuring that communities benefit from reliable and eco-friendly power solutions.  By focusing on cutting-edge technology and sustainable practices, RenewHydro is positioned to play a crucial role in the global shift towards renewable energy. The company targets markets that prioritize sustainability, including municipalities, energy providers, and industrial sectors seeking to transition to renewable energy sources. Through strategic partnerships with industry leaders and stakeholders, RenewHydro is committed to creating a sustainable future while addressing the increasing demand for renewable energy solutions.  In addition to its focus on energy efficiency and ecological balance, RenewHydro emphasizes community engagement and education regarding the importance of renewable resources. The company envisions a world where hydroelectric power is a primary source of energy, reducing reliance on fossil fuels and minimizing environmental impact. Through its commitment to research and development, RenewHydro seeks to lead the way in hydroelectric energy solutions, fostering a more sustainable future for generations to come.

Company description: PureSolar is een bedrijf gespecialiseerd in enkel en alleen zonnepaneelsystemen. Dit is een bewuste keuze. Hierdoor kunnen wij tegen zeer concurrerende tarieven hoogwaardige service en kwaliteit leveren. PureSolar vindt dat een zonnepaneel systeem maatwerk dient te zijn. Onze adviseurs komen bij u langs om de specifieke situatie te beoordelen en zij presenteren u direct een op maat gemaakt pakket. PureSolar ontzorgt u totaal op het gebied van zonnepanelen. Zo doen wij ook de subsidieaanvraag voor u en indien nodig begeleiden we het vergunningtraject. Indien u dit wenst verzorgen wij ook de aanmelding van uw zonnepanelen bij uw energieleverancier. Verder vinden wij van PureSolar het erg belangrijk onze klanten energiebewust te maken. Hiervoor heeft PureSolar een ambassadeursprogramma opgezet. Dit houdt in dat wanneer u klanten aanbrengt u hiervoor wordt beloond met bijvoorbeeld een besparingspakket of een monitoringssysteem. Wilt u hier meer over weten? Vraag het aan een van onze adviseurs.

Name: EVS Energy
Technologies: DUE, Stellar.js, Moment.js, WordPress, jQuery Waypoints, jQuery UI, MySQL, Google Maps, Magnific Popup, jQuery CDN, Nginx, MixItUp, OWL Carousel, jQuery, Chart.js, Slider Revolution, Apache, Choices, reCAPTCHA, Google Analytics, Font Awesome, Google Tag Manager, Hammer.js, Modernizr, Bootstrap, parallax.js, PHP
Company description: Pionier in de vrije energiemarkt EVS Energy is actief in de energiesector sinds 2002. Ons bedrijf heeft zijn wortels in de elektrosector. Bij de vrijmaking van de energiemarkt hebben we ons, op vraag van onze klanten, meer en meer verdiept in de wereld van de energie. Zo groeiden advies en begeleiding bij de aankoop van energie uit tot onze hoofdactiviteit. Onafhankelijk en onpartijdig Aanvankelijk werkte EVS Energy exclusief samen met enkele energieleveranciers. Die werkwijze gaf ons geen voldoening. Daarom kozen we in 2005 voor een volstrekt onafhankelijke opstelling. Sindsdien werken we met onze klanten samen op contractuele basis. De beste formule voor elke klant Omdat we onafhankelijk en onpartijdig zijn, hebben we geen voorkeur voor één of meerdere energieleveranciers. EVS Energy gaat voor elke klant op zoek naar de beste voorwaarden op de markt, op maat van het profiel van de klant. We baseren ons daarbij op onze grondige marktkennis en op harde data over het energieverbruik van de klant. Geen loze beloftes Geen holle slogans of loze beloftes bij EVS Energy. Voor we met een klant gaan samenwerken, berekenen we of de winst van de klant groter zal zijn dan de kostprijs van onze service. Als dat niet zo is, zeggen we dat vooraf klaar en duidelijk. Winst voor de klant, jaar na jaar Voor tal van bedrijven is de winst hoger (vaak zelfs aanzienlijk hoger) dan de kostprijs die EVS Energy aanrekent. Ook dat wordt vooraf duidelijk gemaakt en aangetoond met harde data. Resultaat: een jarenlange en voor de klant winstgevende relatie. Geen wonder dat EVS Energy zoveel trouwe klanten heeft.

Company description: Disporre di energia pulita e a basso costo per tutti è una delle più grandi sfide del nostro tempo. sonnen, con sede produttiva nel villaggio energetico bavarese di Wildpoldsried, nasce con l’obiettivo di offrire a tutti la possibilità di essere protagonisti del proprio futuro energetico. Per questo, propone soluzioni per l’autoproduzione e l’accumulo di energia rinnovabile e la creazione di network di condivisione tra produttori e consumatori. sonnen offre a tutti, in tutto il mondo, l'opportunità di essere indipendenti dall’energia da fonti fossili e dai fornitori di energia tradizionali.   Noi di sonnen ci impegniamo, ogni giorno, per costruire il sistema energetico del futuro. Un sistema in cui l’energia è rinnovabile e le persone sono al centro. Per questo, sviluppiamo nuove tecnologie e modelli di business. Grazie ai nostri sistemi di accumulo di energia intelligenti, alla nostra centrale elettrica virtuale e ai servizi digitali, siamo precursori del nuovo mondo energetico. Un'azienda in rapida crescita, dove innovazione, creatività, passione e opportunità di sviluppo personale trovano il loro spazio. Ciò che ci guida è la nostra vision di un futuro di energia pulita e a basso costo per tutti, con l’obiettivo di preservare il nostro pianeta anche per le prossime generazioni.

Company description: Eficae Soluciones was founded in 2016 from the collaboration between three industrial engineers graduated from the University of Extremadura forming a multidisciplinary team in various areas. The decision was taken to create EFICAE Soluciones to offer a comprehensive engineering and energy consultancy service to companies and entities in both the public and private sectors with a different model, maintaining professional ethics in terms of the constant search for the best solution for our clients and shedding light on a sector as opaque as the energy sector. Since its creation, EFICAE Soluciones has specialised in different services related to energy efficiency and development, such as: Photovoltaic installations, having participated as an engineer in more than 40 MWp of self-consumption and 300 MWp of grid connection. -Energy audits, having audited more than 120 entities in different sectors. -Supply optimisation (electricity and gas bills), currently managing more than 4 GWh. -Development of technological solutions for the monitoring and management of energy demand. The objective of EFICAE Soluciones as a company is to have a sustainable growth in the coming years, however, the current situation of the sector offers an open field of very promising future projects for which we will count, as always, with our partners and we will continue to seek new alliances to remain a reference team and undertake projects together.

Company description: Specialist in zonne-energie Onderscheidend door onze dak-geïntegreerde systemen, landelijke samenwerking met Solar-systemen.nl, uitstekend installatie-team met eigen mensen en bewezen garantie en service. Systemen van 2 tot 2.000 panelen.  Installatie-partner van lokale energiecoöperaties en grote landelijke energieleveranciers.  HD Solar levert zonnestroom installaties voor particulieren, het MKB en agrariërs.  Voor de particuliere markt hebben wij ons aangesloten bij een landelijke franchise organisatie met meer dan 12 jaar ervaring in de branche, solar-systemen.nl. Dat maakt van ons een betrouwbare en stabiele partner in de snel veranderende en groeiende sector van zonne-energie. Daarnaast kunnen wij door een landelijke inkoop A-kwaliteit leveren met zeer goede garanties en tegen scherpe tarieven. Wij maken alleen gebruik van panelen van beursgenoteerde bedrijven en met Europese dealers zodat wij uitgebreide garanties kunnen geven tot 25 jaar.
