Company description: AZOWO – We lead your company into the future of mobility The AZOWO Mobility Cloud is an ISO 27001-certified, modular SaaS platform for fleet software, digital fleet management, and mobility solutions for companies, municipalities, and energy providers who want to organize their operational mobility efficiently, digitally, and future-proof. Whether digital fleet management, corporate car sharing, car subscription, conversion to an e-fleet or sharing concepts – AZOWO offers all solutions on a central interface. With our strong team, we support companies in the transformation and digitalization of their mobility. The AZOWO Mobility Cloud forms the central platform for networked data, services and seamless processes. Sustainability goals are always in focus. Your advantages with AZOWO at a glance: - All-in-one software for fleet management, car sharing, subscription models, and digital mobility services - Real-time vehicle data through direct OEM integration - Intelligent booking algorithm for optimal vehicle utilization and automated vehicle allocation - ISO 27001 certified – highest standards for IT security, data protection, and process quality - Automated reporting including total cost of ownership (TCO) analyses - Customer success team with multilingual, direct, and competent contact persons

Company description: Tarifcheck.de – 20 Jahre Vergleichskompetenz!  Du bist auf der Suche nach einer besseren Versicherung, einem neuen Energieanbieter oder benötigst einen neuen Kredit? Auf unserem Onlinevergleichsportal Tarifcheck.de hast Du die Möglichkeit, schnell, kostenfrei und unkompliziert einen günstigen Tarif oder Anbieter in verschiedenen Bereichen zu finden. Als Vorreiter unter den Online-Vergleichsportalen in Deutschland bieten wir unseren Nutzern aktuelle und günstige Tarife für einen umfassenden Marktüberblick. Bekannt durch Presse, Funk und Fernsehen gehört Tarifcheck.de heute zu den Top 5 Vergleichsportalen im Versicherungs- und Finanzbereich. Unser Ziel: Dir zu den besten Sparpreisen am Markt zu verhelfen.  Damals wie heute haben bei uns die Kunden*innen höchste Priorität. Aus diesem Grund filtern wir tausende Angebote entsprechend Deinen Vorstellungen und erweitern unser Angebot kontinuierlich. Mittlerweile bieten wir kostenlose Vergleichsmöglichkeiten in den Bereichen Versicherungen, Konto & Kredit, Strom & Gas sowie Internet. Die Seite von Tarifcheck.de: https://www.tarifcheck.de  Von Wentorf bei Hamburg aus arbeiten wir gemeinsam in einem innovativen Team von IT, Design, Content-Producern, Strategen und Marketing-Experten kontinuierlich an diversen anspruchsvollen Projekten, um unsere Visionen und Produkte ständig weiter auszubauen.  Dank unseres kleinen Teams profitieren wir von schnellen und kurzen Entscheidungswegen und einer tollen Atmosphäre untereinander. Bei uns arbeitest Du nicht nur an spannenden Projekten, wir bieten Dir Raum für Deine Ideen und Kreativität und lassen Dich Projekte eigenständig gestalten.  Interessiert? Komm vorbei: https://www.tarifcheck.de/karriere/ Das Impressum von Tarifcheck.de: https://www.tarifcheck.de/impressum/

Company description: Welcome to DHS Complete Hire.     At DHS Complete Hire, formerly known as Drogheda Hire & Sales, we have been a trusted name in the Irish construction industry for over 30 years. Our recent rebranding reflects our ambition to grow beyond our current bases in Drogheda and Dublin, positioning us as your comprehensive one-stop shop for all equipment needs. Our Services: Plant & Access Hire: We provide a wide range of plant and powered access equipment from top manufacturers, ensuring you have the right tools for any project. Tool Hire: From DIY and gardening to sanding and cleaning, we offer tools and equipment to help get the job done—big or small. Training Centre: Our fully equipped training centre offers certified IPAF operator courses and more to ensure safe and efficient use of equipment, helping professionals stay compliant and skilled. Welding & Engineering Supplies: We stock products from top reliable brands to support your welding and engineering projects. BOC Gas: As authorized BOC agents, we are your local cylinder gas supplier. Shop: Stocking a selection of smaller tools, accessories, and essential equipment for purchase.. With depots in Drogheda (041 9841419) and Dublin (01 9108757), we are strategically positioned to serve more locations faster, ensuring you get the equipment you need when you need it. Whether you're a homeowner, tradesperson, or contractor, our experienced team is here to provide expert advice and top-tier service.

Company description: S&C provides a chip level design and development (ASICs, FPGAs and SoCs) plus embedded software in several fields like Industry 4.0, Smart Energy, Image recognition and Digital health as most relevant. Our involvement goes from the initial stage of chip design to mass production. As part of our advance development, we employ AI-driven chip design, it involves the use of artificial intelligence (AI) technologies such as machine learning in the tool flow to design, verify, and test semiconductor devices. We use AI to come up with the right set of parameters that delivers the highest ROI in a big solution space in the fastest possible time. In other words, better (and faster) quality of results than otherwise possible. We also offer IoT solutions to organizations in different sectors including telecom, energy providers, healthcare, buildings construction and management, hardware and appliance manufacturers, retailers, insurance companies and Smart Cities. Our platform is a complete IoT end-to-end solution that easily integrates with an existing communication network, monitoring tool or control systems. It connects to any device including sensors, actuators, appliances, meters, wearables, smartphones, smart home and building devices (thermostats, lights, energy plugs, air conditioning, heaters, etc.), cameras, locks, etc.

Company description: Pluss Advanced Technologies B.V. offers a wide range of products based on Phase Change Materials (PCM) and applications for Thermal Energy Storage. We are a solutions provider for PCM thermal storage solutions for cold chain logistics, the building industry, pharma logistics, and the agro-food industry. With over 18 years of experience in the field, we have developed 67 different Phase Change Materials for heat or cold applications ranging from -75°C to 151°C. For cold chain logistics, we provide high-end PCM and related packaging solutions to maintain products at the correct and desired temperature during transportation from farm to fork. PCM can be utilized with all types of perishable goods, including fresh flowers, meat, fish, and soft fruits. For the building industry, our solutions can store thermal energy in PCM via solar or general ventilation. Utilizing renewable energy when available to generate heat or cold and storing it for when needed can significantly reduce energy bills. These options are available to make commercial buildings sustainable and to prepare domestic homes for smart grid integration. Other solutions we offer include a variety of PCM encapsulations that can be used for pharma logistics and cold chain applications. Additionally, we offer off-grid cold storage or dryers for farms in the agro-food sectors.

Company description: AssmannPeiffer advises companies throughout Germany on energy law issues, in particular energy suppliers, municipal utilities, network operators, municipalities and energy-intensive companies. As a "boutique law firm", we at AssmannPeiffer are an experienced team of highly specialized lawyers for energy law. In addition to issues of classical energy law such as regulatory proceedings or the awarding of concessions according to the German Energy Industry Act (EnWG), we are primarily concerned with the law of renewable energies (EEG, biofuels according to BImSchG or KWKG). In addition, private law issues from energy contract law and energy contracting, i.e. energy contracting, i.e. the drafting and negotiation of energy supply contracts including legal representation and enforcement. We focus on the legal implementation of new business ideas in the energy sector and new energy concepts such as power-to-X, virtual power plants and tenant power.

Company description: Welcome to Eltec Green Energy GmbH, your premier destination for cutting-edge power distribution solutions. As a subsidiary of the esteemed Eltec Group, boasting a legacy spanning back to 1970, we stand as leaders in power transformer system integration for the global energy industry. We in Eltec have also our well-established, European-based, consulting division. Comprising a team of international engineers, energy specialists, policy experts, and utility advisors the Group draws on a network of regional and international associates to offer a broad range of services in the energy sector. Our transformers are meticulously engineered to not only optimize performance but also to maximize energy efficiency and ensure long-term durability. This dedication to excellence has solidified our position as the preferred choice for a myriad of power transmission and distribution applications. About us: Drawing upon decades of expertise and a steadfast commitment to innovation, we pave the way towards a sustainable energy future. Our diverse range of highly efficient and reliable power transformers caters to the evolving needs of the electrical power industry. Whether you require small distribution transformers or large power transformers, we possess the capability to deliver bespoke solutions tailored to your exact specifications. Vision statement  To create a sustainable energy future by introducing economically- sound and technically appropriate, clean energy solutions for us and future generations Mission statement  We have a strong commitment as an energy provider and as a project developer to sustainability. To realize our vision, we believe in an energy mix of clean technologies suitable for the local area's energy needs and resource availability. => Worldwide Presence => Local Partnerships => Global Logistics At Eltec Green Energy GmbH, we don't just provide transformers; we power the future. Join us in shaping a sustainable tomorrow, one transformer at a time.

Company description: ANAE es una asociación de consumidores de energía, diferente a cualquier otra existente. Se constituyó a finales del 2010 y desde entonces no hemos dejado de ahorrar dinero en las facturas de nuestros socios (más de 200.000€ en el 2011). ANAE es totalmente independiente, no está ligada a ninguna tendencia política, fabricante, instalador ni a compañías energéticas. Gestionamos más de 86 GWh de consumo de electricidad repartidos en unos 650 suministros y con una potencia contratada de  18 MW. Los suministros de nuestros socios abarcan todo el abanico de tarifas desde baja tensión hasta alta tensión en 6 periodos. Conseguimos ahorros efectivos en las facturas de energía y agua para nuestros socios, de manera directa, mediante la optimización de suministros y la asesoría energética o de manera indirecta mediante auditorías energéticas o instalaciones de eficiencia energética realizadas por empresas que validamos con criterios de calidad/precio favorables para nuestros socios. Pretendemos explotar al máximo las formas de comprar energía que legalmente dispone un consumidor:   - Realizando negociaciones colectivas con las comercializadoras, para conseguir precios fuera de catálogo.   - Potenciando la figura del consumidor directo al mercado y actuando como central de compras, comprando la energía directamente en el mercado mayorista.   - Creación de comercializadoras de electricidad y gas para nuestros socios.

Company description: Mega, founded in 2013 by Thomas Coune and Michaël Corhay, is a Belgian energy provider dedicated to making energy contracts affordable for all Belgians. With a mission to offer a sensible alternative to large multinational corporations, Mega started as a small supplier in Liège and has since grown into a dynamic team focused on enhancing customer experience. The company emphasizes a human touch in its operations, ensuring that real people manage contracts rather than relying solely on automated systems. Mega serves a diverse clientele, including both individual consumers and businesses, and has recently expanded its offerings to include mobile telecommunications services, positioning itself as a competitive player in the market. With a commitment to sustainability and customer satisfaction, Mega aims to continue its growth while fostering a supportive community among its employees and clients.

Company description: IoT solution provider for O&G and building monitoring RCT Remote Control Technology, based in Germany, is one of the leading IoT solution providers for smart remote monitoring of tank installations in Ex environments in the energy industry and of operating states in building technology. The company supports energy suppliers, petrol station operators as well as public utilities, municipalities and property management companies on the path to digital transformation - and taps the potential of the "Internet of Things" for more efficient business processes. RCT develops and manufactures transmission units for the detection of tank levels or operating states - for local and global networks. The range of solutions includes level monitoring of liquid and gaseous media in storage tanks such as liquid gas, heating oil, diesel and A1 fuels as well as technical gases, water and chemicals in stationary and mobile applications. In addition, RCT offers smart solutions for the remote monitoring of buildings and facilities. These include the recording of power consumption and the monitoring of movement, temperature, pressure, humidity as well as heating, cooling and air conditioning systems.  With certifications according to ATEX, CE, ISO, QPS, TÜV and others, the products developed and manufactured by RCT in Germany stand for safe and tested device technology. For secure and fast data transmission, the manufacturer relies on state-of-the-art transmission technologies such as Cellular 4G/3G/2G, NBIoT, Sigfox, LoRaWAN, CatM1, LTE, WLAN, RF and GPRS. Developers and programmers of software solutions With the IoT platform "RCT Monitor" as well as IoT platforms, RCT has cloud-based solutions for applications in the "Internet of Things" of the energy world. This enables the simple, secure and scalable networking of physical objects such as IoT transmission units for tank and object monitoring and of PC-based systems. Contact us: info@r-c-t.biz

Company description: Would you like to turn your home smart? Would you like to be able to remotely control your home from anywhere in the world, with only a tap on your smartphone? With Qubino Smart Home Solutions you can make any home smart. You can start with as little as being able to remotely control your electric devices, your smart lights or shades, your garage door, etc. or furthermore, you can create scenes for different times of the day, from “Good morning” to “Good night” scenes, or scenes tailored to your mood.  Would you like to be on top of your energy consumption and are looking for ways to save energy? With Qubino Smart Meters you can measure your energy consumption and consequently lower your electricity bills. Qubino devices are one of the smallest Z-Wave microcontrollers in the world, used to control lights, shutters and other electrical devices in your home, via a smartphone or tablet. Small size and specially designed casing ensure a simple installation (ease of cabling fixing) inside a flush mounting box. Qubino devices re constantly being tested and have been proved and tested by professional electricians.  Some additional features: -	The devices can be used as an extension to control the heating/cooling system.  -	The devices have the option to connect a digital temperature sensor.

We make stronger boxes from fewer raw materials and generate less waste at source due to our eco-friendly manufacturing methods. This includes renewable energy providers and almost all materials supplied by sustainable forestry. Corrugated cardboard meets all environmental guidelines and is a great packaging option that has a minimal impact on the planet. We manufacture printed and plain corrugated cardboard boxes, ideal for shelf, retail and transit, and offer our customers a consistent and reliable service to ensure that their products reach their customers in well-presented packaging that enhances their brand. We have years of experience creating top quality packaging for the Pharmaceutical, Food & Drink, IT Hardware, and Engineering industries, and our dedicated team will provide you with a friendly and professional service from initial enquiry through to quotations, samples and delivery of your packaging. Every customer has unique requirements and expectations, and we are delighted to exceed every time.

Company description: Digitalprojekt 4 GmbH (DP4) began as an innovation subsidiary of EWE AG, Germany's fifth-largest energy supplier. Our team's first project was AMPERAS, with which we created a digital marketplace for energy supply contracts. Later, we founded energieberater.io, where we used our AMPERAS platform to offer customized energy consulting for businesses throughout Germany. In 2021, we shifted to electromobility, secured financing and proudly joined EWE Go in mid-2023. EWE Go builds charging stations across Germany that are 100% powered by renewable energy and together we are committed to the growing e-mobility industry in Germany. Our teams are focused on developing cutting-edge digital solutions that enable a seamless charging experience for electric vehicle users.  As an international team, we pride ourselves on our open-minded, dedicated and friendly culture. Together we have developed a set of values which are as follows: Make an Impact, Have fun, Trust the Team and Stay Focused.

Tešíme sa, že môžeme veci robiť inak a bez obmedzení, či už je to stratégia na ktorej sa podieľajú všetci zamestnanci, alebo kreatívny a inovatívny marketing, či kvalitný obchodný tím, ktorý nie je iba doručovateľom zmlúv, ale odborníkom a partnerom tisícov naších zákazníkov. 🏊 Denne pomáhame naším zákazníkom preplávať komplikovanými vodami energetického biznisu tak, aby sa mohli na plno venovať svojmu primárnemu predmetu podnikania. Zanedbateľný ročný churn je dôkazom, že to robíme správne. 💪 Tisíce spokojných B2B a B2C zákazníkov pomohli TWINLOGY narásť zo štartovacích 1,6 mil. EUR na dnešných takmer 20 mil EUR ročného obratu. Name: LITGAS
Technologies: Go, Drupal, Google Font API, ZURB Foundation, MySQL, Apache, Clipboard.js, Google Maps, PHP, jQuery, Google Analytics, WordPress
Company description: LITGAS is a natural gas supplier and trader, part of the largest energy company group in Lithuania Lietuvos Energija.   Currently the main activity of LITGAS is of strategic importance – the company supplies the minimum required natural gas volume to ensure minimal continuous operation of the Klaipėda’s LNG terminal. From the moment of being appointed as a designated supplier by order of the Minister of Energy ensuring the minimum required gas quantity became the responsibility of LITGAS.   For this purpose on August 21, 2014, after almost a yearlong procurement procedure, a 5-year contract for the supply of 0.54 bcm of natural gas (around 950 thousand cubic meters of LNG) was signed with the Norwegian energy company Statoil.   The designated supplier helps Lithuania to achieve its strategic goals: it creates and supports open access to the global natural gas market, gives the opportunity for suppliers to make use of advantages this market offers, ensures security of supply and promotes real competition on the Lithuanian natural gas market.   In addition to being a designated supplier, LITGAS has ambitions to become a competitive player on the natural gas and LNG supply markets, also pursue growing activities of bunkering, i.e. supply of LNG as fuel for ships. The company has non-binding master agreements for LNG purchases with 15 global suppliers which combined supply more than half of the world’s LNG. These agreements enable quick purchases of gas by LITGAS on international spot markets.

With the Green Cloud Decarbonization Platform, we aim to create and maintain a new green energy marketplace, fundamentally simplifying green energy contracting and procurement. Korszerű megoldásunk segítségével hidat építünk a termelők, befektetők és a fenntarthatóság mellett elkötelezett vállalkozások közé.

Name: Cambridge Health Plan Benelux
Company description: Het Cambridge dieet is voor mensen met (zwaar) overgewicht, die snel willen afvallen en met andere diëten onvoldoende resultaat boeken. Al na enkele dagen raakt het lichaam in ketose en start de vetverbranding.   Het Cambridge dieet is ontwikkeld aan de universiteit van Cambridge. Doctor Allan Howard verrichtte alles bij elkaar 7 jaar onderzoek naar het dieet, in samenwerking met Addenbrook’s Hospital. Hierover verschenen diverse wetenschappelijke publicaties. De sleutel is het lage percentage koolhydraten. Omdat het lichaam minder koolhydraten binnen krijgt dan het strikt gezien nodig heeft, gaat het lichaam zelf op zoek naar zijn eigen reserves. Wanneer deze op zijn, wordt de volgende energieleverancier in het lichaam aangesproken: overtollig vet! Enkele dagen na het begin van het dieet start de vetverbranding. Dit is een medisch volkomen verantwoorde manier om snel gewicht te verliezen. Intussen krijgt het licham in de vorm van uitgebalanceerde shakes, soepen en repen, alle benodigde voedingsstoffen binnen, inclusief vitaminen en mineralen.  Het dieet is uitsluitend verkrijgbaar via een onafhankelijk Cambridge consulent. Onderzoeken wijzen uit dat het volgen van een dieet onder begeleiding effectiever is, dan zonder begeleiding. Met name de consulenten van Cambridge vormen in dit opzicht een toegevoegde waarde.

Name: Warmte Transitiecentrum Groningen | WTCG
Technologies: Google Font API, Priority Hints, Shopify, Open Graph, WordPress, RSS, Piwik PRO Core, easy pie chart, Microsoft 365, PHP, LiteSpeed, Google Fonts API, JSON-LD, Contact Form 7, oEmbed, jQuery Migrate, HTTP/3, MySQL, jQuery Mobile, Nginx, Litespeed Cache, Yoast SEO, FitVids.js, reCAPTCHA, jQuery
Company description: Het WTCG is de samenwerking van de Groninger gemeenten en de provincie om de warmtetransitie te versnellen. Wij geloven dat duurzame warmte iedereen nieuw woongeluk geeft. In energie ligt opnieuw de basis om comfort en welvaart te vergroten. En als nieuwe energie groen is draagt het ook bij aan ons welzijn. Wij vinden het logisch dat Groningers hierin voorop gaan, want hun welzijn staat extra onder druk. Na de gaswinning heeft de regio met de transitie naar duurzame warmte een nieuw perspectief in het vooruitzicht waar we snel werk van willen maken. Zo maken we de transitie eerlijk en veilig, als duurzame aanjager voor wijk en dorpsvernieuwing en blijvend woongeluk. Samen versnellen maakt ons koploper. Het welzijn van Groningers staat bovengemiddeld onder druk, omdat de inkomens relatief laag zijn en energierekeningen juist hoog. Gaswinning heeft in een groot deel van de provincie zijn sporen achtergelaten. Maar ook de vergrijzing is omvangrijker dan in andere delen van Nederland. Het maakt investeren in eveneens oudere woningen moeilijk of niet aantrekkelijk meer. En als het geld en de wil er wel is, dan is verduurzamen vaak lastig. Het lukt velen om verschillende redenen niet om goede stappen te maken. Daar willen we verandering in brengen. Vanuit onze visie heeft Groningen alles in huis om koploper in de transitie te zijn. Alleen door samen op te trekken pakken we problemen aan die grootschalige verduurzaming in de weg staan. Met een krachtige, gezamenlijke aanpak waardoor iedere Groninger mee kan doen. Het transitiecentrum verschaft helderheid en is een gids voor gemeenten, provincie en partners in transitie. Met een praktische en innovatieve aanpak voor de gewenste versnelling. We ondersteunen ambtenaren, colleges en gemeenteraden proactief in hun transitietaak met kennis, capaciteit en middelen. Wij nemen regie op samenwerking om de kentering te bevorderen. Om grip te krijgen, samen aan de slag te gaan en Groningers grote stappen vooruit te helpen.

Company description: Groen Eerlijk Nederland is opgezet om misbruik binnen de energiebranche tegen te gaan en zogezegd de stem te zijn voor het recht van de consument.  Wij hebben het onze missie gemaakt om het onderzoeksproces naar de meest voordelige energieleverancier volledig uit handen te nemen voor de consument.  Uit talloze onderzoeken is gebleken dat er vaak te veel wordt betaald voor gas en elektra. Wij als Groen Eerlijk Nederland hebben dit zelf ook meegemaakt in ons persoonlijk leven. Vaak wordt er gebruik gemaakt van ‘’slapende klanten’’, waar wij zelf ook een van waren.  Wij hebben alle universele behoeften van de consument gerangschikt: hierdoor wordt alles gefilterd en wordt er alleen op maat gewerkt met de klant. Wij bij Groen Eerlijk Nederland geloven erin dat we ervoor kunnen zorgen dat elke klant een fijn gevoel heeft bij hun leverancier én dat het voldoet aan hun eisen en behoeftes. Zowel financieel als op andere vlakken. Dit doen wij op een groene, maar vooral eerlijke manier.

Company description: Wer wir sind und was wir bieten Die in Kiel und Berlin ansässige enQu GmbH versorgt viele tausend Haushalts- und Gewerbekunden sicher und zuverlässig mit Energie: Strom und Erdgas. Bundesweit. Seit 2017 ist Statkraft, Europas größter Erzeuger erneuerbarer Energie, an enQu beteiligt. Neben attraktiven Preisen setzt enQu auf kundenfreundliche Vertragsbedingungen, innovative Strom- und Gastarife und zahlreichen Serviceleistungen.  Wer uns auszeichnet  In der bundesweit durchgeführten Vergleichsstudie „Stromanbieter 02/2017“ der Deutschen Gesellschaft für Verbraucherstudien mbH (DtGV) belegte enQu unter hundert weiteren Energieversorgern einen erfolgreichen 3. Platzt. Wen wir versorgen enQu wendet sich an Haushalts- und Gewerbekunden, die Wert auf eine preiswerte Energiebelieferung mit zuverlässigem Service und konstanten Preisen legen. Kunden, die Interesse an klimaneutralen Energieprodukten, praktischen onlinebasierten Zusatzleistungen, aber auch Interesse an Lieferungen mit preiswertem Erdgas und Heizstrom besitzen, bietet enQu ein zeitgemäßes wie vielfältiges Portfolio an Produkten.  Was unsere Kunden schätzen  Die Kommunikation zwischen Unternehmen und Kunde erfolgt vorzugsweise digital. Ähnlich einer Onlinebank entfallen zeitraubende Telefonate oder Besuche im Servicecenter.  enQu Kunden haben stets einen bequemen Online - Zugriff auf ein überraschend umfangreiches Service- und Dienstleistungsangebot. enQu Kunden entscheiden darüber hinaus selbst, ob sie diese preisbegünstigt elektronisch oder eher konventionell in Anspruch nehmen.

Company description: Zirconite de Negocios nace para dar respuesta a dos necesidades del sector energético, la atención personalizada al cliente y el ahorro de costes.  Somos asesores energéticos y colaboradores oficiales de Iberdrola. La eficiencia energética es un punto importante para reducir el consumo de energía, ahorrar costes energéticos y mejorar la sostenibilidad medioambiental.  Al utilizar la energía de forma eficiente, podemos reducir nuestra dependencia de los combustibles fósiles, que contribuyen al cambio climático y aumentan la contaminación. Zirconite revisa y analiza tus contratos energéticos y las condiciones contratadas, para garantizar que tu contratación sea la mejor opción para tu empresa y el mejor precio según tu consumo. Analizamos tus facturas de energía y los contratos de suministro, para la asistencia y gestión en la negociación con nuestro proveedor de energía, Iberdrola, con el fin de reducir tus costes energéticos, negociar el mejor contrato y costes para tu consumo. Al trabajar con nosotros, las empresas pueden alcanzar sus objetivos de sostenibilidad y, al mismo tiempo, crear un impacto positivo en sus resultados. Si quieres colaborar con nosotros y quieres seguir creciendo, necesitamos gente como tú, inconformista, que quiera desarrollarse profesionalmente en una empresa puntera en el sector. Buscamos colaboradores energéticos con perfil comercial para asesorar a empresas ofreciendo soluciones que les permitan reducir los costes del consumo energético, así como dotarles de las herramientas necesarias para una correcta gestión energética.  Si estás interesado en colaborar con nosotros, contáctanos en el 973 268 797 ¡Esperamos tener noticias tuyas!

Company description: La energía limpia y asequible para todos es uno de los mayores desafíos de nuestro tiempo. Con sede en el pueblo energético bávaro de Wildpoldsried, sonnen GmbH quiere que todas las personas determinen su propio futuro energético. Eso significa, entre otras cosas, la producción y el almacenamiento económicos de energía renovable y la interconexión inteligente de productores y consumidores. sonnen ofrece así a las personas de todo el mundo la oportunidad de independizarse de los combustibles fósiles y del proveedor de energía convencional. En sonnen, estamos construyendo el sistema energético del futuro. Un sistema energético en el que la electricidad sea limpia y las personas sean las protagonistas. Para ello, estamos desarrollando nuevas tecnologías y modelos de negocio que antes no existían. Ya sea almacenamiento de energía inteligente, centrales eléctricas virtuales o servicios digitales, marcamos las tendencias de un nuevo mundo energético. Esto crea un espacio para la innovación, la creatividad, la pasión y las oportunidades de desarrollo personal en una empresa en rápido crecimiento. Nuestro impulso es nuestra visión de energía limpia y asequible para todos. Porque queremos que nuestro planeta siga siendo habitable para la próxima generación. Si quieres cambiar y rediseñar el sistema de energía junto con nosotros, esperamos recibir tu solicitud a través de nuestra página de contacto https://sonnen.es/contacto-cliente-lp/

Company description: “A system which perfectly detects and records every single lightning stroke, with all its characteristics – this objective is definitive for nowcast” – Prof. Hans-Dieter Betz, inventor of LINET nowcast has developed an extraordinarily efficient and precise lightning detection system. As a leader in quality nowcast delivers its data to national weather services, energy suppliers, insurance companies and many more sectors with highly reliable and comprehensive lightning data. The system stems from the long-standing research work carried out by Prof. Hans-Dieter Betz at the Ludwig-Maximilians-University in Munich. In the year 2002, nowcast GmbH was founded for the purpose of marketing this technology. Since then, the lightning-detection system has been successfully offered all over the world under the brand name of LINET (Lightning Detection Network). The central spheres of activity of nowcast GmbH comprise research and development in the field of lightning-detection, as well as the operation and sale of the lightning-detection system LINET and the meteorological uses derived from it and storm data.

Company description: Founded in 1987, baer Energie & Messtechnik is the go-to specialist for communications and energy measurement solutions. Our products are used in industry and by energy providers around the world. We believe that the challenge of our generation can only be met by better control and reduced energy consumption and that you can only do that when you have a clear picture of what’s actually happening. That’s why we develop meter data capture and transmission technologies that give our customers a clear and accurate insight into their energy consumption in real time. It’s not only energy efficiency that is driving change. Social and technological developments, such as eMobility, together with industry deregulation are increasing competition and forcing companies to focus on new business models. Whether you’re dealing with electricity, gas or water, building energy management or district heating,  our products and expertise can help you maximise these new opportunities and the revenue streams that they offer. Contact and legal: http://baer-emt.de/contact/

Company description: 24/7 Carbon-Free Energy (CFE) Solutions Voltfox is an energy sector software provider based in Germany. The company was founded in 2018 to help accelerate the digital transformation of the energy industry using blockchain technology. We are proud to be the only early-stage European startup invested in by the famous Draper University Ventures. At Voltfox, we are at the forefront of the energy industry's transition towards sustainability. Our specialized 24/7 Carbon-Free Energy (CFE) software for energy providers represents the cutting edge of this transformation. 24/7 Carbon-Free Energy Matching is the core of our innovative approach. It involves the precise matching of energy generation with consumption to contribute to reducing greenhouse gas emissions, making a positive impact on the environment and climate change. Using our software, the energy providers simplify climate action for their energy off-takers.  We are committed to transforming the energy landscape by making 24/7 Carbon-Free Energy matching an industry standard. By working with Voltfox, you're not just investing in software; you're investing in a greener, more sustainable future for our planet. Voltfox is a proud member of Eurelectric and the United Nations 24/7 CFE Compact.  Join us in our mission to harness the full potential of clean energy and lead the way toward a more sustainable world.

Our interdisciplinary team has built award-winning AI assistants that power seamless conversations. These solutions, field-tested across millions of interactions, deliver exceptional customer experiences by continuously adapting to the highest standards of language understanding and voice recognition technology. Our AI-driven platforms have been showcased at global trade fairs in Berlin, Amsterdam, London, New Orleans, and Las Vegas. As a leader in conversational AI, we combine deep industry experience with cutting-edge generative AI, providing a unique competitive advantage to our clients as they adapt to the evolving landscape of AI-powered customer service.

Company description: Wir sind eQuota, ein Digital-Startup mit Sitz in Berlin. Wir vermarkten für unsere Kunden die CO2-Einsparungen im Rahmen der gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen Treibhausgasminderungsquote (THG-Quote) aus der Inverkehrbringung aller alternativen Kraftstoffe, wie z.B. Ladestrom, Biomethan oder grünen Wasserstoff. Dadurch verschaffen wir unseren Kunden attraktive Zusatzerlöse bei minimalem Aufwand für die Abwicklung der erforderlichen Prozesse. Zu unseren Kunden gehören Stadtwerke & EVU, Betreiber von Ladepunkten und deren Dienstleister sowie gewerbliche als auch private E-Mobilisten. Quotenverpflichteten Mineralölunternehmen ermöglichen wir einen einfachen und planbaren Zugang zu neuen Erfüllungsoptionen der THG-Quote. Unsere Dienstleistungen umfassen: - automatisierte, digitale Erfassung und Verarbeitung der für die THG-Quote relevanten Daten und Dokumente - Abwicklung aller behördlichen Prozesse - Bündelung der THG-Quoten unserer Kunden für eine erfolgreiche Vermarktung - Vermarktung der THG-Quoten zu Großhandelspreisen ************ We are eQuota, a Berlin based digital startup. We market the CO2 savings generated from using renewable fuels within the legally required greenhouse gas reduction quota (GHG quota) framework. We provide attractive additional revenues with minimal effort for handling the required processes to our customers. Our customers include municipal utilities & energy suppliers, charging point operators and their service providers, as well as commercial and private e-vehicle owners. We provide mineral oil companies with easy and predictable access to new GHG quota fulfillment options. Our services include: - automated, digital collection and processing of data and documents relevant to the GHG quota - Handling of all regulatory processes - Bundling of our customers' GHG quotas for successful marketing - Marketing of the GHG quotas at wholesale prices (bearbeitet)

Company description: OZE PROJEKT S.A. is a Polish company dedicated to providing essential contact information for local energy suppliers, particularly in an era marked by increasing digitalization and reliance on electricity. The company aims to facilitate quick access to contact details for energy providers, ensuring that households and businesses can efficiently address technical inquiries or emergencies. With a mission to enhance safety and peace of mind for its clients, OZE PROJEKT S.A. serves a diverse clientele, including individual consumers and businesses across Poland, where over 90% of the population uses electricity daily.  In addition to its information services, OZE PROJEKT S.A. specializes in renewable energy solutions, particularly focusing on heat pumps, including air, ground, and water models. The company is committed to providing efficient and sustainable heating solutions that cater to the diverse needs of its clients, ranging from individual homeowners to larger residential communities. By promoting energy efficiency and reducing environmental impact through its innovative products and services, OZE PROJEKT S.A. positions itself as a leader in the renewable energy sector. The company collaborates with reputable manufacturers and suppliers to ensure high-quality offerings that enhance energy independence for its customers. With a vision centered on delivering reliable and eco-friendly energy solutions, OZE PROJEKT S.A. is well-equipped to meet the growing demand for sustainable energy alternatives in the market. Through its dual focus on providing critical contact information and innovative renewable energy solutions, OZE PROJEKT S.A. plays a vital role in supporting the energy needs of Polish consumers and businesses alike.

Company description: Messer is the world's largest privately owned specialist for industrial, medical, and specialty gases. Under the brand 'Messer - Gases for Life', the company offers gases and services in Asia, Europe, and America. The cooperation between the more than 11,500 highly qualified international employees is based on mutual respect. Messer pays particular attention to diversity and inclusion.  Messer's 'Gases for Life' are used in industry, environmental protection, medicine, the food industry, the electronics industry, welding and cutting technology, 3D printing, construction, research and science. Messer offers one of the largest product portfolios on the market and develops application technologies for gases in state-of-the-art competence centers. 'Gases for Life' are as important as water and electricity in most industrial processes and can play a significant role in their decarbonization, for example through the use of green hydrogen, CCUS, or oxyfuel technology. In its customers' processes, Messer's customized gas solutions ensure greater safety, efficiency, quality, capacity, and environmental compatibility and/or reduce the associated emissions and costs.  Messer Bulgaria was established more than 25 years ago and is the first European gas supplier to enter the Bulgarian market.

Company description: Energie.be is een no-nonsense Belgisch groene energieleverancier met één doel: de energiemarkt voorgoed veranderen door ze eenvoudig, eerlijk en duurzaam te maken.  Eerlijkheid boven alles: We blijven weg van misleidende prijsstrategieën en kleine lettertje. Maar bieden één zo scherp mogelijk tarief aan, jij kiest of het vast, variabel of dynamisch is. Dat doen we niet alleen vandaag maar jaar na jaar. Het bewijs hiervan? Check de V-test. Daar vind je ons steeds terug in de top.   Eenvoudiger kan niet: Eenvoud: dát is de rode draad doorheen alles wat we doen. Geen overbodige producten of diensten, of 10 verschillende tarieven voor éénzelfde product, wel verstaanbare mensentaal, een simpele website en gebruiksvriendelijke klantenzone. En we doen alles digitaal. Zo houden wij onze kosten laag en jouw energie goedkoper. Win-win dus! De toekomst is duurzaam: We focussen ons op de lange termijn, voor zowel onze planeet, als onze klanten en collega’s. We maken de energietransitie begrijpbaar voor onze klanten en bieden hun innovatieve oplossingen aan die écht een impact hebben Kortom, bij Energie.be zit je niet alleen vandaag, maar levenslang goed.

Name: Era Energy
Technologies: AccuRate, SAP, Document Control, AIMS
Company description: (for English, croll down) Era Energy staat voor een nieuwe en unieke manier van zakendoen in de energiemarkt. Waar het grootste deel van de energieleveranciers zich wil onderscheiden door een zo laag mogelijke prijs, geloven wij dat u als klant meer verdient. De prijs is namelijk slechts een momentopname en door veranderingen op de markt kan de prijs op enig moment gunstig, maar op een ander moment weer nadelig uitvallen. Era vindt dat u recht heeft op een compleet aanbod. Dit houdt niet op bij een goed tarief, dat is slechts het begin. Het bevat ook bewustwording van de werking van de energiemarkt en een duurzame oplossing aangereikt krijgen. En hiernaast is nog alle ruimte voor een verbetering van de aarde waarop wij leven! Era Energy stands for a new and unique way of operating in the energymarket. Where most of the energiesuppliers try to differentiate theirselves with low pricing, we believe that you, as a customer, deserve more. Price is temporarily and with the fluctuating prices in the energymarket, the rate can be advantageous at one time, as well as very disadvantageous at another.  Era Energy believes that you deserve a complete offer. This doesn't end with a good price, that's just the beginning. It also contains awareness of how the energiemarket operates, and receiving a durable solution. A solution for a better planet.

Name: EoT Plus S.R.L.
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, La Spezia, 22 Via Terralba, 19100
Technologies: Baidu Analytics, Apache, Nginx
Company description: WHO WE ARE EoT Plus is a company based on the idea that creating competences, experiences, and challenges for the future is a synonym for success.   Its founding members are entrepreneurs with decades of experience in the production and commercialisation of goods in the industrial sector.   EoT Plus offers services and innovative solutions in the field of energy efficiency for both residential and industrial use.  Obtaining economic benefits for the customer by means of consumption optimisation represents EoT Plus' main objective.  This is then complimented by a strong attention to the production of green energy with the interest of future generations in mind.  EoT Plus, with its strategic partners, Energy srl (www.energysynt.com) and EoT Solutions USA (www.eotsolutions.com), is part of a circuit of companies specialised in the research and experimentation of energy saving solutions and the production of totally renewable energy sources. WHAT WE OFFER Energy Analysis - EoT Plus has forged an agreement with the University of Pisa. Any analysis of the customers’ consumption shall be carried out in cooperation with the Department of Engineering, Systems, Territory and Constructions of University of Pisa. Hence EoT Plus is able to supply a service with high technological value and under the scientific supervision of researchers and experts from the sector. Feasibility of proposed actions - following the energy audit, EoT Plus proposes solutions supported by specific feasibility studies for each single project. The proposal describes the most sustainable solutions from a technical, economic and financial point of view. The cooperation with the University of Pisa also extends to this stage: the proposed solutions shall be sustained by strict technical and scientific considerations. Plants for the production of energy from renewable sources - EoT Plus aims to search for technical solutions using plants for the production of energy from renewable sources, such as photovoltaic plants (isolated or connected to the grid) or cogeneration plants, for the production of thermal energy by solar heat.  The possibility to make use of “inexhaustible” sources for self-production allows for an important reduction in the energy supply costs, whether electricity and heat. Energy storage systems - EoT Plus proposes the lithium storage system X-Hybrid series Sk-SU, in conformity with standard CEI 021.  This is the most recent technology in the field of solar inverters, allowing to reduce its dependence on the traditional energy suppliers and to increase the consumption of self-produced energy (minimum 80%). Furthermore, through the Wi-Fi function supplied as standard on the device, it offers remote control from a specific portal. FOR WHOM EoT Plus' capabilities and benefits best suit the following use cases: Industry Each company has specific needs and priorities for customised solutions. As a first step EoT Plus proposes an estimation of the company’s energy consumption. This is then followed by a tailormade action plan to obtain a significant reduction of the energy consumption costs and transforming the company into an ecologically sustainable entity.  EoT Plus wishes to demonstrate that more attention paid to the interests of our planet can represent a key factor for success and increase the competitiveness of businesses. Residential Energy saving is also a very important issue for the final consumer. EoT Plus offers a portfolio of solutions also for residential households. Also in this case, the estimation has proven to be a valuable instrument for the proposal of efficient actions adapted to the specific features of the house that is under consideration. EoT Plus can also be engaged at the design stage of the property, so that efficient and ecologically sustainable energy technologies are built in from the  get-go.

Company description: The Norwegian Wind Energy Association (NORWEA) is the voice of the Norwegian wind and ocean energy industry. NORWEA has, since it was established in 2006, promoted the utilization of renewable energy from wind in Norway.  We are ideally situated in the heart of Oslo ensuring close proximity to Norwegian decision makers. With approximately 130 members: developers, contractors, electricity providers, wind turbine manufacturers, component suppliers, finance and insurance companies, lawyers, consultants and research institutions. NORWEA represents the entire value chain of the industry. We are the industry’s key meeting place for wind and ocean energy academics, political discussions and industrial collaboration. NORWEA’s lobbying helps create a suitable legal and financial framework within which members can successfully develop their businesses. NORWEA analyses, formulates and establishes policy positions together with the wind and ocean industry on key issues. NORWEA produces a large variety of information tools and manages campaigns aimed at raising awareness about the benefits of wind and ocean renewable energy, dispelling the myths about wind and ocean energy and providing easy access to credible information. NORWEA organises numerous regular events: conferences, seminars and workshops, together with and for the industry. This makes NORWEA the most powerful and successfull network for wind and ocean energy in Norway.

Company description: Die goldgas GmbH, einer der ersten alternativen Gasanbieter am liberalisierten österreichischen Gasmarkt, wurde 2011 gegründet. Als österreichischer Energieversorger mit Firmensitz und Servicecenter in Wien beliefert goldgas Haushalte sowie Klein- und Mittelbetriebe in ganz Österreich. Durch eine effiziente Kosten- und Organisationsstruktur bietet goldgas seinen Kunden, getreu dem Motto: „Österreichs günstiger Energieversorger“, langfristig faire Preise. Faire Preise sind für goldgas Unternehmensphilosophie und Leitmotiv in einem. Hinter goldgas steht mit der VNG Gruppe einer der großen Erdgaskonzerne Europas. Dadurch garantiert goldgas Versorgungssicherheit und faire Preise. 2014 beschritt goldgas mit dem Verein für Konsumenteninformation (VKI) erstmals neue Wege und gewann die Aktion „Energiekosten-Stop“ in der Sparte Gas. Auch bei der VKI Aktion 2017 und 2021 ging goldgas als Bestbieter in der Sparte Gas im Marktgebiet Ost hervor.

Company description: Greenbird Integration Technology is a pioneering company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions for the energy sector, with a strong emphasis on data integration and management. The company's mission is to empower organizations to harness the full potential of their data, facilitating a transition to a more sustainable and efficient energy landscape. Greenbird's vision is to lead the digital transformation in the energy industry, enabling clients to optimize their operations while reducing their environmental impact. The company serves a diverse clientele, including utility companies, energy providers, and governmental organizations, and collaborates with strategic partners to provide tailored solutions that address the unique challenges of the energy market. By focusing on the integration of renewable energy sources and smart grid technologies, Greenbird aims to enhance the efficiency and reliability of energy systems, thereby promoting energy independence and reducing carbon footprints. The company also specializes in advanced instrumentation and control systems for nuclear power plants, ensuring safety and operational efficiency through innovative reactor designs. Greenbird's commitment to sustainability and operational excellence positions it as a key player in the evolution of the energy sector, targeting organizations that seek to modernize their operations and improve data management. With a robust portfolio that includes gas turbines, steam turbines, and advanced control solutions, Greenbird collaborates closely with its clients, which range from utilities to independent power producers. The company is dedicated to engineering cleaner and more accessible energy, supporting the global transition towards a lower carbon future. Through continuous innovation and a focus on decarbonization, Greenbird Integration Technology aims to build a world that works for everyone, shaping the future of energy management and contributing to a greener planet.

Company description: Markedroid is a cleantech company that provides seamless Virtual Power Plant (VPP) orchestration solutions to households. Our mission is to empower homeowners to take control of their energy consumption, production, storage and selling, while also contributing to a more sustainable future. Our innovative VPP solution allows homeowners to connect their energy-producing assets, such as solar panels to a virtual power plant network and individual forecasts are then aggregated and optimized as a fleet in a cloud-based, asset-agnostic virtual power plant. This virtual network enables homeowners to sell their excess energy to the grid, contributing to the stability of the energy system and reducing their energy bills. At Markedroid, we are committed to providing our customers with the latest and most innovative energy solutions on the market. Our team of experts is constantly working to improve our VPP solution and ensure that our customers are always one step ahead in the energy game. Join us in our mission to create a more sustainable energy future.

Company description: - GNP Energy er Nordens 4. største energiselskab - og en uafhængig strømleverandør.  Når du vælger at give os din tillid, er du med til at udfordre giganterne i branchen. I modsætning til disse, har vi hverken kommunale eller politiske interesser, eller eget strømnet.  Vi har ikke egen energiproduktion og derfor har vi heller ingen interesse i at højne strømpriserne.  Vores ambition er i stedet, forudsigelighed og lavest mulige strømomkostninger, over tid, for vores kunder.  GNP Energy har medarbejdere med lang erfaring i energibranchen, alt fra handel med strøm på Nord Pool og erfaring med energibranchen ift. rådgivning og salg.  Hos os finder du ingen tunge markedsmæssige budgetter og store prangende lokaler. Vi holder fokus på en effektiv drift og lave omkostninger.  Vi skal være en kompetencevirksomhed som fokuserer på, at vores medarbejdere skal udvikle sig både fagligt og socialt. Dette skaber trivsel og vækst.  - Positivt og enkelt. Vi er en udfordrer og det stiller høje krav til vores kontakt med vores kunder.  Vores ambition er at have markedets bedste kundeservice.  Via e-mail svarer vi hurtigt og ventetiden på telefon skal ikke være mere end 30 sekunder.  Vores slogan er: Energy Made Easy! Se mere på: www.gnp.energy

Company description: We are passionate and creative minds focused on developing products for Smart Cities in a collaborative effort between  Sao Paulo, Lisbon and Bucharest. We create new urban meeting points with solar powered design objects with Wifi, and light electric vehicle chargers for users convenience, activating communities, raising awareness for public initiatives or brands.   In 2015, we started an R&D program to validate new design concepts for cities and parks. After validating the technologies and designs, we  moved to the prototype phase and tested our first product - VTree™ fractal - a tree-shaped, quick installation, solar powered, Wifi and energy provider that can beautifully be integrated in any city or park. We are sustainable, we know what we do and we love what we do. We are VTree™SOLAR. All connected, you're connected! MISSION We aim to provide citizens with state-of-the-art technology, beautifully integrated in their context, whilst environmentally friendly. VISION To plant Wi-fi solar trees in every city, promoting sustainable energy solutions well integrated in the existing urban space CORE VALUES Sustainability, Innovation, Technological capacity, Cooperation and Reliability.

Company description: Good Salez is een dochteronderneming van de XS Direct groep, een fieldmarketing organisatie die al sinds 2007 werving- & promotiecampagnes verzorgt voor bedrijven en instellingen in de profit en non-profit sector. Na met succes het bestaande studentenlabel People Marketing te hebben opgezet, werd het tijd voor een nieuwe uitdaging. In juni 2016 is Good Salez opgericht met als doelgroep, fulltimers. Momenteel is Good Salez in drie steden actief en is er de ambitie om landelijk uit te breiden. Waarom werken bij Good Salez? Good Salez is een fieldmarketing organisatie die werkt met een eigen en uniek ontwikkeld product genaamd, Good Energy www.goodenergy.nl. Good Energy is een maatschappelijke prijsvergelijker voor de energiemarkt, waarbij de klant kan kiezen uit de aangesloten energieleveranciers. De aangesloten leveranciers bieden duurzame energie aan, tegen lagere tarieven. Bij iedere wisseling van energieleverancier door Good Energy, wordt er een mooie donatie gedaan aan KiKa. Onze filosofie is: het creëren van een win-win situatie voor alle betrokken partijen. Wij geloven in ons product en wij willen landelijk het verschil gaan maken in de energiemarkt én voor KiKa. Good Salez werkt mét mensen vóór mensen. Op evenementen, langs de deur, op straat, op de winkelvloer en beurzen. Altijd met een goed gesprek als uitgangspunt. Werken met Good Energy geeft een good feeling! “Good people work for Good Salez!”

Name: Ultra-Controlo International LDA
Company description: Ultra-Controlo is a Portuguese specialist in the design, manufacturing, supply and installation of medical gas systems for industry, hospitals, and clinics. For more than 35 years we are giving the best service and technical support for all our customers including worldwide known gas suppliers.  Our background as sole distributors of leading companies in vacuum and compressed air allowed us to go one step in front and offer very innovative systems to the customers.  Ultra-Controlo is able to operate under different medical gas standards from ISO 7396, HTM and other standards and even to offer medical gas systems that exceed the typical international standards, as we know how to do it better.  Ultra-Controlo is included in the list of the European Manufacturers of Medical Devices and we are proud to have hundreds of medical gas plants running tens of years without a single failure.  Our people are engaged to promote the use of the best systems available to you and this contributes to play a vital role in hospitals where our focus is to protect the physical integrity of all kind of people that needs medical gases.

Company description: enerpeak GmbH is a technically sophisticated and reliable leader in advancing the energy transition through utility-scale battery storage system (BESS) development. We combine in-depth market knowledge, pragmatic yet visionary technical expertise, and robust supply chain relationships. As a leading provider, we develop and implement customized battery storage solutions to meet the growing demands of the energy market. Our solutions can operate as standalone systems across all grid-voltage levels or in collaboration with municipalities, PV and wind park operators, and large industrial consumers. enerpeak is built on a highly experienced management team with strong expertise in energy and financial markets, professional technical capabilities, and extensive hands-on experience in project development and supply chain management. This foundation empowers us to drive BESS developments in today's market and create solutions for future demands. We are actively pioneering future mainstream BESS applications that will be ready to scale as regulatory frameworks adapt to market needs, including co-location and multi-use solutions. With strong supply chain partnerships for BESS and critical infrastructure components like transformers and PCS, we can reduce time to market, secure competitive prices, and increase project ROI. Our management team includes a pragmatic former C-level executive from one of Europe’s largest energy providers and a visionary serial entrepreneur with a background in electrical engineering and extensive financial market experience. Together with our seasoned senior staff, we deliver exceptional service to partners and clients as a technically sophisticated, reliable leader in the energy transition.

Company description: Die Stadtwerke Kerpen GmbH & Co. KG sind seit Ende 2019 aktiv und gelten aktuell noch als „kleinstes und jüngstes Stadtwerk“ in Deutschland. Die Stadtwerke selbst verstehen sich als digitaler und der Nachhaltigkeit verschriebener Energiedienstleister. Zu den Geschäftsfeldern zählt der Vertrieb von Ökostrom, Energiedienstleistungen in den Bereichen Photovoltaik, Wärme und E-Mobilität für Privat-und Gewerbekunden. Darüber hinaus sind sie verantwortlich für die energetische Erschließung von Quartieren mit Wärme, Kälte, Mieter/Quartiersstrom, digitales Quartiersmanagement sowie Glasfaserinfrastruktur. Ein weiteres Themenfeld ist der geförderte Ausbau von Glasfaserinfrastruktur im ländlichen Raum und in Neubauquartieren. Ebenfalls fördern die Stadtwerke den Ausbau und Betrieb von öffentlicher Ladeinfrastruktur. Stadtwerke Kerpen is an energy supplier based in Kerpen, Germany.  We aim to become the partner of choice for energy and technical customer solutions for the people in Kerpen.

Company description: Utilityfair is Ireland's largest commercial electricity and gas broker with 15,000+ customers nationwide. We have a verified Trustpilot score of 'Excellent' and thousands of reviews from happy customers. Using our market knowledge, buying power and strong relationships we'll sort out your energy costs and card transaction charges in minutes and make sure that you stay on the best deals year after year. Utilityfair works with over 15,000 businesses in Ireland of all shapes and sizes and from all industries, including start-up and mature companies. Whether our client is a small retail shop, restaurant, property manager or a large energy user running a manufacturing plant, we will sort out their energy costs in minutes and make sure that they never overpay ever again by auto-renewing onto an expensive plan or slipping onto expensive ‘out of contract’ rates. Businesses no longer need to pay too much for electricity and gas or go through a frustrating and time-consuming process of phoning individual electricity and gas suppliers - waiting on hold for ages and trying to figure out the differences between suppliers and the hidden charges.  Utilityfair does all of the heavy lifting so that our customers can make a quick and hassle-free decision that saves money year after year. Our clients can focus on running their business, knowing that they are getting the best deals in the market.

Company description: Tynagh Energy Limited (TEL) represents a highly skilled collaboration of international and local expertise which came together to build Galway’s first power generating station. TEL successfully tendered for a competition in December 2003, run by the Commission for Energy Regulation (CER) to design, finance, construct, operate and maintain a 400MW Combined Cycle Power Plant (CCGT) in east Co. Galway. TEL is in a unique position of being the only independent CCGT plant in the Irish market and provides a flexible daily electricity product to the Irish wholesale electricity market. TEL can provide a fixed forward product known as a Contract for Difference (CfD), where large energy users and electricity suppliers can fix their forward electricity prices. Procuring a CfD provides large energy users with price certainty and allows electricity suppliers to offer a fixed price to their customers. TEL are active participants on the Tullett Prebon OTC market and are also available to contract on a bilateral basis. If you wish to discuss how Tynagh Energy can help you with your electricity requirements please contact the Trading Team at +353 (0)1 857 8700 or trading@tynaghenergy.ie.

Company description: Deventer Energie Coöperatie wil de overgang van fossiele en nucleaire energiebronnen naar duurzame energiebronnen sneller mogelijk maken. Zij wil Deventer duurzamer maken. Dit doet zij samen met, voor en door de inwoners van de gemeente Deventer. Deventer Energie wil haar doelstellingen bereiken door: •	informatie te verstrekken   •	de lokale betrokkenheid en draagvlak te vergroten •	de verduurzaming van woningen te stimuleren •	zelf duurzame energie op te wekken door coöperatieve zon en windprojecten e.d. •	de samenwerking tussen partners en lokale (markt)partijen te bevorderen   Met duurzame energie zijn we minder afhankelijk van fossiele energiebronnen, die opraken en bijdragen aan de klimaatverandering. Door lokaal energie op te wekken ben je (steeds) minder afhankelijk van andere energieleveranciers. Deventer Energie is een lokale coöperatie en werkt ook zoveel mogelijk met lokale experts. Samen maken we Deventer duurzamer.

By creating a unified ecosystem that integrates these elements, we aim to accelerate this transition and provide significant societal benefits.  At Scandinavian Data Centers (SDC), we build resilient, high-capacity data centers that seamlessly integrate into a broader ecosystem. In collaboration with our sister company, Scandinavian Energy Centers (SEC), we optimize synergies between data storage, energy efficiency, and the reuse of excess heat. Together, we drive the green transition by supporting IT businesses, energy providers, and municipalities, ensuring sustainable and future-proof infrastructure.

Company description: Od ponad sześciu lat nasza firma oferuje kompleksowe usługi montażu fotowoltaiki dla domów i firm w całej Polsce, pomagając klientom czerpać korzyści z energii słonecznej. Nasza misja to dostarczanie wysokiej jakości rozwiązań, które przynoszą realne oszczędności finansowe. Bezpłatna konsultacja Proces zaczyna się od bezpłatnej konsultacji, gdzie analizujemy potrzeby i możliwości techniczne klienta. Na tej podstawie tworzymy indywidualną ofertę, która optymalizuje koszty i maksymalizuje oszczędności. Nasza firma wspiera klientów na każdym etapie — od analizy finansowania, przez pomoc w formalnościach, aż po zakończenie instalacji. Jakość Kluczowym czynnikiem dla naszych klientów jest jakość. Dlatego stosujemy sprawdzone komponenty, które pozwalają nam oferować długoterminowe gwarancje. Dzięki temu inwestycja w fotowoltaikę zapewnia korzyści przez wiele lat. Zadowoleni klienci Nasze doświadczenie i jakość usług zdobyły zaufanie setek zadowolonych klientów. Wielu z nich poleca nas znajomym i rodzinie, co jest dla nas najlepszym dowodem uznania. Każdy klient może liczyć na nasze pełne wsparcie zarówno w trakcie instalacji, jak i po jej zakończeniu. Wybierając nas, decydujesz się na doświadczenie, profesjonalizm i najwyższą jakość. Dzięki naszym usługom fotowoltaika staje się inwestycją, która realnie obniża rachunki za energię. Zapraszamy do kontaktu — nasi specjaliści są gotowi odpowiedzieć na każde pytanie i przygotować ofertę dostosowaną do Twoich potrzeb. Wybierz sprawdzonego partnera, który gwarantuje oszczędności i satysfakcję.

Company description: Vaste Lasten Service heeft zich gespecialiseerd in het realiseren van besparingen voor consumenten op hun vaste lasten. Met onze werkwijze kunnen we een gemiddeld huishouden  € 500,- per jaar besparen! De dienstverlening van Vaste Lasten Service richt zich op het pakket van verzekeringen, energie, telefonie, TV en breedband. Bestaande aanbieders worden continu met elkaar vergeleken en hun aangeboden dienst wordt toegespitst op de specifieke situatie van onze leden. Marktkennis De dienstverlening van Vaste Lasten Service houdt niet op na een enkele besparing en/of adviesgesprek. Door collectieve inkoop, contractbeheer en het continu actualiseren van onze marktkennis zijn onze leden altijd verzekerd van een optimaal pakket aan vaste lasten. Ook kunnen leden eenvoudig bij ons terecht met vragen en/of opmerkingen via de ledenservice. Het is een belangrijk onderdeel van de missie van Vaste Lasten Service: consumenten helderheid verschaffen in een ondoorzichtige markt en direct actie ondernemen op mogelijke besparingen! Vaste Lasten Service Adviesgesprek De service van Vaste Lasten Service start met een objectieve en onafhankelijke analyse van de huidige situatie. De kosten van dit eerste adviesgesprek nemen wij voor onze rekening! De adviseur van Vaste Lasten Service zal het huidige pakket vergelijken met andere mogelijkheden en de te realiseren besparing wordt helder en overzichtelijk aan de klant gepresenteerd. Een eventuele aanpassing van het bestaande pakket wordt pas in gang gezet nadat de klant hier toestemming voor heeft gegeven. We hebben geen contractuele verplichtingen met energieleveranciers, banken, geldverstrekkers, verzekeringspartners en/of andere instanties die ons onze onafhankelijkheid zou afnemen. Deze partijen hebben ook geen aandeel in het bedrijf.

Company description: Le courtage en énergie, qu'est ce que c'est ? Saviez-vous que le prix du gaz et de l'électricité sont négociés tous les jours en fonction des prix boursiers ?   Multi-Energy aide les consommateurs professionnels à choisir une offre de fourniture d'électricité et/ou de gaz naturel, auprès de plusieurs fournisseurs. La plupart des indépendants et entreprises n'ont pas le temps ni la possibilité d'obtenir des comparaisons transparentes de prix de plusieurs fournisseurs simultanément. Multi-Energy vous donne la possibilité de recevoir la meilleure offre de prix parmi une dizaine de fournisseurs ! Cette offre est obtenue quotidiennement en fonction des prix de l'énergie sur les marchés boursiers. Ce concept est unique en Belgique, venu tout droit d'Angleterre, où les marchés se sont libéralisés bien avant les nôtres.   Multi-Energy n'est pas un fournisseur de gaz ou d'électricité : nous négocions le meilleur prix du jour en fonction de votre profil d’utilisateur. Nous effectuons exactement la même démarche pour les panneaux photovoltaïques.

I consulenti energetici Teta Project infatti sono specialisti del settore in grado di guidare la  famiglia lungo un percorso di diagnosi dei consumi della casa e l’individuazione delle migliori soluzioni energetiche per il risparmio e la salvaguardia dell’ambiente. Il consulente energetico Teta Project ti accompagna e ti consiglia al meglio per aumentare il profitto della tua famiglia riducendo i costi e sfruttando fonti energetiche pulite, disponibili, gratuite. + EFFICIENZA: con gli impianti ad energie rinnovabili si incrementano le prestazioni energetiche degli edifici, perché si riduce il consumo di fonti fossili, si aumenta il valore dell'immobile e si vive meglio. + INDIPENDENZA: azzerare le bollette è possibile. Con un impianto fotovoltaico, una pompa di calore o un sistema solare termico la tua casa o il tuo condominio possono conseguire l’indipendenza energetica e puoi avere energia elettrica, riscaldamento, raffrescamento e acqua calda a costo zero e rispettando l’ambiente. + RISPARMIO: quanto spendiamo ogni mese per le bollette del gas e dell’energia elettrica? E quanto potremmo risparmiare? Liberarsi dalle bollette e guadagnare dall’energia prodotta fa dell’investimento energetico una scelta lungimirante, che si ripaga da sé in poco tempo e che aumenta il reddito disponibile per la famiglia. + FUTURO: Non solo efficienza e risparmio per le tue tasche ma salvaguardia dell’ambiente attraverso l’utilizzo di risorse energetiche pulite e disponibili. E’ il momento che ognuno di noi, nel proprio piccolo, faccia qualcosa per la qualità del mondo in cui viviamo e in cui vivranno i nostri figli.

Company description: Zich onderscheiden van de 56 andere leveranciers op de Nederlandse energiemarkt. Dát is wat Mega Nederland wil doen.   Sinds februari 2022 kunnen Nederlandse consumenten kiezen voor de goedkopere en groene energie van Mega Nederland. Mega is reeds in België en Frankrijk actief als energieleverancier en meer dan 750.000 klanten profiteren daar al van onze lage tarieven voor stroom en gas.    Hoe we ons precies willen onderscheiden van de rest? Door dezelfde energie, gewoon voordeliger aan te bieden. Om dat te kunnen doen, houden we onze overheadkosten zo laag mogelijk. Onze administratie, IT, marketing en sourcing wordt bijvoorbeeld helemaal geregeld vanuit ons hoofdkantoor in België.   Vanuit ons kantoor in Rotterdam helpen onze lokale medewerkers onze klanten verder met elk aspect van hun energiecontract. Bovendien heeft ons team jarenlange ervaring, zo vermijden we onnodige kosten en kunnen we een vlotte service garanderen.   Daarnaast…  - doen we niet aan kleine letters. We vinden het belangrijk dat ons aanbod voor iedereen duidelijk is.  - vinden we de tijd van onze klanten kostbaar. Daarom sturen we geen ingewikkelde nota’s.   - houden we van het milieu en bieden we groene stroom aan. Op jouw jaarnota lees je vervolgens waar jouw stroom precies vandaan komt.   - zijn we bereikbaar via chat en webform.

Company description: 4INCH sa/nv is a belgian company developping a Snugr, a heating management and optimization solution: https://www.snugr.be Snugr is revolutionizing the way we manage heating in public and private buildings. With heating accounting for 30% of operational costs in schools, offices, and public buildings, the need for an efficient, cost-effective solution is paramount. Snugr offers a seamless integration of hardware and software that empowers facility managers and building owners to take control of their heating systems, reducing energy bills by up to 40% and significantly lowering their carbon footprint. Snugr's Core Features are * Room-by-Room Control: Snugr's battery-free thermostatic valves and other easy-to-install products like aerotherm, boiler, and underfloor heating controllers allow for precise temperature control in each room. * User-Friendly Interface: Our intuitive software interface simplifies heating management, making it accessible even for those without technical expertise. * Smart Algorithms: The system employs optimization algorithms that analyze past heating patterns, outdoor temperature, and room thermal inertia to determine optimal heating schedules. * Nearly Work-Free Installation: Snugr's products require minimal installation work, making the transition smooth and cost-effective. 4INCH was finalist of NEST'up 2012 (a Techstar style accelerator in Belgium) and is a member of the WSL, a Walloon incubator for engineering sciences. In late 2020, Snugr was awarded the Solar Impulse Efficient Solution label, by a panel of experts, for contributing to a greener planet in an sustainable and profitable way.

Company description: Zonneboiler Magazijn De terugverdientijd van zonneboilers was lange tijd niet interessant aangezien de overheden de subsidies nagenoeg alleen maar richten op zonnepanelen (elektriciteit) en de zonneboiler systemen duur zijn in aanschaf. De rendementen zijn echter per vierkante meter erg hoog. Tevens bent u met een zonneboiler niet afhankelijk van uw energieleverancier. U gebruikt immers uw opgewekte energie voor uw eigen huishouden. Door gebruik te maken van diverse Europese leveranciers en goede inkoop afspraken te maken, zijn wij in staat complete doe het zelf pakketten samen te stellen die (ook zonder subsidie) zeer interessant zijn. De materialen zijn van hoge kwaliteit en hebben gelijke, zo niet hogere rendementen als de dure systemen van de concurrent. Zonneboiler Magazijn is een handelsnaam van Statice Helden B.V. Wij verhandelen enkel de materialen. De installatie kan door u zelf of door uw installateur worden uitgevoerd aan de hand van duidelijk instructie materiaal. Doordat wij geen winkelpand en duur personeel hebben, kunnen wij de producten tegen scherpe prijzen aanbieden.

Company description: Wij zijn Powercrumbs. Als enige in de markt vangen wij reststromen van biogas op die anders verloren gaan. Deze restjes vormen samen een onuitputtelijke bron van duurzame energie, geschikt voor elke energievraag. Onze oplossing? De Powerbox. Deze slimme container levert schone energie waar het nodig is. De Powerbox wordt eenvoudig gekoppeld aan het aanwezige aggregaat op locatie, bijvoorbeeld in gebieden met netcongestie of zonder aansluiting op het elektriciteitsnet. Binnen no-time beschik je over de duurzaamste energie in de markt. Alles is online gekoppeld, zodat je altijd inzicht hebt in je energievoorraad en optimaal gebruik maakt van beschikbare bronnen. Onze Powerbox is verkrijgbaar in verschillende formaten (10- of 20-voets containers) en flexibel inzetbaar. Wie wij helpen met verduurzamen? •	Bouwbedrijven •	Infra- en civiele techniek •	Producenten van bouwmaterialen •	Overheden en waterschappen •	Mobiele energieleveranciers Het resultaat? Geen verspilling van biogas. Een schoner product. En een concrete stap naar een duurzame toekomst. Wil je ontdekken hoe wij jouw organisatie kunnen verduurzamen én bijdragen aan een schonere wereld? Volg ons en neem contact met ons op!

Oggi facciamo parte di Tecno Group, Sustaintech Corporation che sviluppa soluzioni per la sostenibilità economica, ambientale e sociale delle imprese. Le nostre radici affondano a Rimini, dove ha sede il nostro quartier generale, ma operiamo anche in Spagna con un distaccamento dedicato, per essere sempre più vicini alle aziende che vogliono ottimizzare la gestione dell’energia. I valori che ci distinguono: • Indipendenza – Non siamo legati a fornitori di energia o tecnologie, garantendo sempre la soluzione più vantaggiosa per te. • Trasparenza – Rendiamo comprensibili i tecnicismi del settore, aiutandoti a prendere decisioni consapevoli. • Sostenibilità – Da oltre 25 anni promuoviamo un uso razionale dell’energia, riducendo l’impatto ambientale delle imprese. • Persone al centro – Costruiamo relazioni di fiducia con clienti e collaboratori, con un approccio autentico e concreto. Vuoi ridurre i costi e migliorare l’efficienza della tua azienda? Contattaci per scoprire come possiamo aiutarti a trasformare l’energia in un vantaggio competitivo.

Company description: Uit persoonlijke frustratie ontstaan. Slimme Wi-Fi thermostaat. Mooi Nederlands design. Makkelijk te bedienen. Moeiteloos aanpassen met de iPhone, iPad of Andoid app altijd en overal. Geschikt voor aan/uit en Open Therm CV-ketels. Geen abonnementskosten. ThermoSmart is ontwikkeld door een jonge, Nederlandse start-up uit onvrede met het huidige aanbod aan nodeloos gecompliceerde thermostaten. ThermoSmart is begonnen met een schone lei en heeft een geheel nieuw thermostaatconcept ontwikkeld met als belangrijkste kenmerken: 1)    eenvoudig in gebruik 2)    altijd en overal te bedienen 3)    helpt besparen 4)    onafhankelijk van energie- en ketelleveranciers. Marktonderzoek 75% van de Nederlandse huishoudens verwarmt  het huis terwijl niemand thuis is. De belangrijkste reden is een onbegrijpelijke thermostaat. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan het programmeren op een klein LCD schermpje met veel onduidelijke knoppen. Bovendien blijkt uit onderzoek dat meer dan 50% van de Nederlanders hun thermostaat op afstand wil kunnen bedienen. Crowd funding 2013 Eind 2013 is ThermoSmart succesvol gecrowdfund en bovendien geëindigd in de top 5 van best gefunde projecten in 2013. Mede daardoor is ThermoSmart is onafhankelijk van energieleveranciers en ketelproducenten. Toekomstvisie ThermoSmart is dé thermostaat van nu en van de toekomst. Duurzaam en nooit klaar met leren. Het creëert een online platform dat gebruikservaringen en data om het gemak van de mens te dienen. Daarnaast kunnen er in de toekomst allerlei diensten worden toegevoegd, zoals het aansturen van de CV-ketel op basis van de locatie van de gebruiker en zelflerend vermogen met weersVOORspelling. De gebruiker is met ThermoSmart verzekerd van de slimste en meest gebruiksvriendelijke thermostaat die er is. Twitter       : twitter.com/Thermosmart_nl Facebook : facebook.com/iThermosmart.nl

Company description: EnergieControle en GrootzakelijkEnergie optimaliseren energiekosten voor grootzakelijke klanten. Dus is niet een van de vele online energieprijs check of onderdeel van een energieleverancier. Het is een neutrale offline inkooporganisatie en biedt u, plus andere grootzakelijke bedrijven, scherpere energietarieven door middel van schaalvoordeel en expertise van de markt.  Op de websites, www.energiecontrole.nl en www.grootzakelijkenergie, kunt u informatie vinden om uw energiekosten te verlagen. Wij werken op basis van `No cure, No pay´. U kunt daarom gratis uw contactgegevens achterlaten, dan neemt 1 van de energie consultants contact met u op voor een bedrijfscan. De energieconsultant kan doormiddel van een telefonisch gesprek genoeg informatie verschaffen om met uw gegevens een scherper energietarief op te vragen. U kunt vervolgens dit tarief zelf beoordelen en/of accepteren. Er komen verder geen extra kosten bovenop dit tarief, er zit namelijk tevens een kleine marge in voor GrootzakelijkEnergie. Echter is het uiteindelijke tarief voor stroom of gas ten alle tijd lager dan dat u individueel een tarief opvraagd. EnergieControle checkt vervolgens maandelijks en jaarlijks uw nota's...  Vrijblijvend, gratis en transparant! en..... niet geschoten is altijd mis!
